This American bourbon unfolds a harmonious tapestry of flavors, including notes of candy corn, honey nougat, and sweet cornbread biscuits, culminating in a finish graced by the luscious interplay of vanilla and caramel apple. Comprising a blend of straight bourbons aged between 2 to 13 years within charred white oak barrels, this expression from High West Whiskey elevates the art of sipping, appealing to those with discerning tastes. Its well-proportioned body also lends itself admirably to crafting classic cocktails like the Manhattan, making it an ideal choice for mixologists and whiskey enthusiasts alike. In addition to delivering exceptional whiskey, each bottle of High West contributes to the preservation of the American West. High West Distillery dedicates a portion of its after-tax profits to support the American Prairie Reserve, championing the preservation of this pristine wilderness. Choose High West American Prairie Barrel Aged Bourbon Whiskey and savor the taste of craft whiskey inspired by the pioneering spirit of the West. As you indulge, remember to do so responsibly. © 2020 High West Distillery, Park City, UT. 46% alcohol by volume.
ImageLink: images/products/High West American Prairie Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: High West Double Rye Whiskey
Description: High West Double Rye! Barrel Aged Rye Whiskey artfully marries the vivacious character of a youthful, spicy 2-year-old rye whiskey with the refined grace of a mature counterpart. This harmonious blend manifests a spirited flavor profile, initially brimming with the bold spices of rye, followed by notes of menthol, invigorating mint, refreshing eucalyptus, and the subtle nuances of herbal tea, all underscored by the gentle embrace of wildflower honey. As the journey unfolds, the whiskey gradually sweetens, leaving a trace of anise on the palate. This exceptional American whiskey, bottled at a robust 92-proof, expertly combines straight ryes that have undergone oak barrel aging for a span of two to seven years within newly charred white oak barrels. The inherent spiciness of this whiskey elevates timeless classics such as the Old Fashioned and the Manhattan cocktail. With its impeccable balance of cinnamon, anise, and honeyed whiskey notes, High West Double Rye! is equally delightful when savored neat, perhaps with a touch of water, or served over ice. Whether you choose to relish this whiskey in the tranquility of a campfire's glow, share it with cherished friends, or extend the hand of camaraderie to a captivating stranger, High West Double Rye! invites you to embrace its captivating blend. Opt for High West and partake in the pleasure of exceptional craft whiskey, steeped in the pioneering spirit of the American West. Sip Responsibly.

Name: High West A Midwinter's Night Dram Whiskey Limited Release
Description: High West, Utah's pioneering distillery, founded its legacy in the year 1879. High West A Midwinter Night's Dram Whiskey emerges as a limited release, born from the esteemed High West Rendezvous Rye, culminating in an exquisite marriage within the embrace of French oak and port barrels. This distinguished whiskey artfully fuses the essences of aged straight ryes, gracefully matured over a span of 5 to 19 years, within charred white oak barrels. At 98.6-proof, this whiskey exudes richness and full-bodied character. Revel in the opulent tapestry of flavors, where notes of dried fruits, luscious fig syrup, and candied ginger intermingle, paving the way for a crescendo of spiced blackberries, aromatic cloves, and the comforting warmth of cinnamon. For an unparalleled tasting experience, we recommend savoring this whiskey neat. Its intricate layers of complexity unfold best when enjoyed beside a crackling fire, as snowflakes gracefully gather on the window sill, providing the perfect backdrop for a Midwinter Night's Dram. Choose High West A Midwinter Night's Dram Whiskey and discover the essence of an extraordinary craft, crafted by the spirits of Utah's untamed terrain. Sip Responsibly.
ImageLink: images/products/High West A Midwinter's Night Dram Whiskey Limited Release.webp

Name: High West Rendezvous Rye Whiskey
Description: High West Rendezvous Rye Whiskey is the result of an intricate blend of straight rye, thoughtfully aged for four to seven years within the embrace of charred American white oak barrels. This meticulous process contributes to the creation of a blended whiskey that boasts an elevated rye composition, culminating in an uncompromising, full-bodied flavor profile. Elevate your palate with a symphony of sensations as bold, spicy notes take center stage, harmonizing with hints of cinnamon, velvety vanilla, luscious caramel, molasses richness, and the delightful essence of candied fruit. The balanced body of this extraordinary spirit renders it the perfect choice for crafting whiskey cocktails that are nothing short of exceptional. Indulge in the essence of American whiskey by savoring it straight, allowing the intricate layers of flavor to envelop your senses. Additionally, the high rye mash bill positions this cinnamon-infused whiskey as an indispensable element in the crafting of a timeless classic, the Manhattan cocktail. Select High West and embark on a journey of savoring craft whiskey that embodies the pioneering spirit of the American West. Please enjoy responsibly.

Name: Dewar's White Label Blended Scotch Whisky
Description: Savoring scotch is an endeavor reserved for the bold of heart, yet it need not come with an exorbitant price tag. This is where Dewar's White Label gracefully steps in, tailored for those discerning individuals who seek the essence of smooth scotch, unburdened by superfluous frills. Dewar's White Label is your passport to wherever you desire to be. Since its inception in 1899, this scotch whiskey has adhered to a time-honored traditional distillation process. It weaves together the luscious notes of honey, velvety vanilla, crisp apple, and the embrace of oak wood into a harmonious and versatile symphony. The experience culminates with a gentle smokiness and a delicate nuance of fudge, permitting you to revel in the pleasures of chocolatey decadence without the need to visit a confectionery or supermarket. To embark on the optimal Dewar's White Label journey, begin by uncorking and allowing it to breathe for just a few moments. This ritual bestows upon the blend the opportunity to unleash its full spectrum of flavors, enveloping your senses in its captivating embrace. While grenades to the face are seldom desired, one might consider making an exception for Dewar's White Label, especially when mischief beckons. Reserve a place for this spirit in your cabinet, ready to infuse moments with spontaneity and mirth. For those who must explore the realm of cocktails, Dewar's White Label proves to be a splendid companion. Elevate your mixology prowess by crafting a classic Rob Roy, effortlessly blending it with sweet vermouth and bitters, or indulge in the subtle harmony of equal parts Dewar's White Label and amaretto for a delectable libation. Seize the opportunity to purchase Dewar's White Label online at an exceptional price through Drizly. Revel in the convenience of direct delivery to your doorstep or choose to acquire it from a nearby store, embracing the art of scotch appreciation on your terms.
ImageLink: images/products/Dewar's White Label Blended Scotch Whisky.webp

Name: Dewar's 12 Year Blended Scotch Whisky
Description: Dewar's 12 Year Flavor Profile: Experience the essence of honey, reminiscent of homemade candy apples, coupled with a luscious note of fudge. Revel in the warmth of buttery textures, wrapped in mellowness, where juicy raisins harmonize with the zest of fresh citrus, delicately kissed by subtle vanilla undertones. Encounter a clean, full-bodied liveliness, akin to melted caramel with a trace of oak, all culminating in a rounded, exceptionally smooth, and enduring finish.

Name: Balcones Texas Pot Still Bourbon Whisky
Description: Introducing the brand-new Balcones Texas Pot Still Bourbon, carefully distilled from a unique blend of roasted blue corn, Texas wheat, Texas rye, and malted barley. Our commitment to delivering bold, distinctive flavors has always been at the heart of our exceptional Texas whiskies, and this bourbon is a testament to that tradition. Crafted from start to finish with traditional pot still distillation methods, it yields a spirit of remarkable richness and viscosity, perfectly suited for aging in new charred oak barrels without compromising its intrinsic qualities. Each sip embodies character and full-bodied essence, welcoming you with an aromatic entrance and a smooth, enduring finish—an inviting yet unforgettable whiskey experience.
ImageLink: images/products/Balcones Texas Pot Still Bourbon Whisky.webp

Name: Chivas Regal 12 Year
Description: Experience the exquisite Chivas Regal 12 Year Whisky, meticulously crafted through the harmonious blending of various malt and grain Scotch whiskies, each aged for a minimum of 12 years. This exceptional blend artfully combines a rich, velvety texture with a harmonious fusion of tradition and contemporary flair. Color: A captivating, warm amber hue. Nose: Immerse yourself in an aromatic bouquet of wild herbs, heather, honey, and the essence of orchard fruits. Taste: Delight in the opulent, fruity symphony that Chivas offers, as the smooth, honeyed flavors of ripe apples take center stage, complemented by subtle undertones of vanilla, hazelnut, and butterscotch. Finish: Revel in the indulgent, enduring finish that graces your palate, leaving a truly generous impression that lingers long after your last sip.

Name: Breckenridge Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Breckenridge Bourbon originates from the stunning Rocky Mountains of Colorado, an unconventional setting that defies the expectations of many bourbon enthusiasts. However, its impressive array of accolades stands as a testament to its undeniable quality. Crafted in the heart of the mountains, Breckenridge Bourbon, boasting an 86-proof blend, aspires to make its mark on the global stage, emerging from its mountainous craft distillery. What lies within a bottle of Breckenridge Bourbon? This exceptional bourbon showcases a mash bill comprising 56 percent yellow corn, 38 percent green rye, and 6 percent unmalted barley. Yet, the true magic lies in the pure snowmelt that gracefully descends from the lofty Rockies. Following fermentation, it undergoes a meticulous distillation process in copper pot stills, aging for a mere two or three years. So, what characterizes the flavor profile of Breckenridge Whiskey? Picture rye toast adorned with honey, now transformed into a liquid embodiment. The high-rye composition accentuates the earthy, zesty notes of rye, accompanied by subtle traces of banana and brown sugar. Additionally, you'll discern hints of white pepper and toasted sesame. As you savor the experience, a lingering, sweet finish graced by a touch of oaky vanilla awaits. This bourbon is deserving of a full-fledged appreciation, making it a perfect candidate for sipping neat or over ice. Alternatively, embrace the classics with bourbon-based concoctions such as an Old Fashioned or a Mint Julep, both of which magnificently showcase the brilliance of this exceptional spirit. Elevate your bourbon experience by acquiring Breckenridge Bourbon online through Drizly, offering the convenience of doorstep delivery or in-store pickup.

Name: A.D. Laws Four Grain Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Crafting a four-grain Bourbon is a meticulous art that demands unwavering adherence to all the revered traditions of Bourbon production. However, it distinguishes itself by featuring the trifecta of flavor grains that brilliantly complement the corn foundation: barley, wheat, and rye. Achieving this extraordinary bourbon expression is a testament to the distiller's expertise and precision. Within the confines of our distillery, these four 'American mother grains' are thoughtfully amalgamated in precise proportions within our cooker. This harmonious union gives rise to a whiskey of unparalleled complexity and flavor. The outcome is a masterful symphony that allows each grain to shine individually while preserving a harmonious equilibrium that defines exceptional bourbon.
ImageLink: images/products/A.D. Laws Four Grain Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Nikka Whisky From The Barrel
Description: Nikka From The Barrel represents a masterful blend, skillfully curated from an array of malt and grain reserves that Nikka cherishes. This exceptional creation was meticulously crafted to encapsulate the full spectrum of flavors and the profound richness that can only be extracted 'from barrels' – a realm exclusively explored by master blenders. With a robust alcohol content of 51.4%, this whisky comprises a plethora of distinctive elements, demanding a critical phase of 'marriage' within seasoned casks lasting 3-6 months. This crucial step allows the liquid to attain stability and a harmonious balance that defines its unique character. The distinct, squat bottle embodies the concept of 'a small block of whisky,' serving as a visual testament to the whisky's opulent and bold essence that awaits discovery within.

Name: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky
Description: At the Miyagikyo distillery, Nikka proudly operates two Coffey stills, a tribute to the ingenious inventor Aeneas Coffey. Imported from Scotland in 1963, these venerable stills bring forth a distillate of unparalleled richness and complexity, surpassing the capabilities of contemporary column stills. This artful process bestows a singular character that serves as the cornerstone of Nikka's signature blends. These extraordinary bottlings stand as a testament to Nikka's unwavering commitment to innovation and excellence.

Name: Rebel Yell Kentucky Straight Bourbon
Description: Rebel Yell Kentucky Straight Bourbon: The classic, time-honored recipe boasting a substantial, well-rounded body and rich flavor. Tasting Notes: Indulge in the sweet allure of honey and butter, accentuated by delicate hints of plum and raisins, culminating in a satisfying, enduring finish, with a captivating touch of spiciness. Ingredients: Crafted from a blend of wheat, corn, and malt. Nose: Experience the inviting aroma of honey, butter, and raisins that sets the stage for a remarkable bourbon experience.

Name: Old Forester 86 Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whisky
Description: Old Forester 86 Proof stands as the pioneer of American Bottled Bourbon. At a well-balanced 86 Proof, Old Forester presents a vibrant and lively flavor profile, making it an ideal choice for savoring neat, over ice, with a touch of water, or as a key ingredient in timeless cocktails.
ImageLink: images/products/Old Forester 86 Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whisky.webp

Name: Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style Bourbon
Description: Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style is a carefully crafted selection of small batch barrels, bottled at a robust 115 proof, capturing the authentic barrel strength of Bourbon during the Prohibition era.

Name: Old Forester 100 Proof Signature Bourbon
Description: Old Forester 100 Proof is meticulously chosen from specially selected barrels, yielding a bold and spicy Bourbon. Bottled at 100 Proof, it preserves its unique character, catering to aficionados who savor a higher proof spirit.

Name: Old Forester 1910 Old Fine Whisky
Description: 1910 Old Fine Whisky, the concluding expression in Old Forester's distinguished Whiskey Row Series, is a Bourbon that undergoes double-barreling, resulting in a harmonious blend of sweet oatmeal raisin cookie and milk chocolate. It introduces notes of caramel corn and evolving spices, culminating in a polished, charred oak finish.

Name: Old Forester Statesman Bourbon
Description: Old Forester Statesman is a selection of small batch barrels meticulously chosen from the warmest sections of the warehouse. It serves as a tribute to the two distinguished figures of Old Forester, George Garvin and Owsley Brown, who ushered in an industry revolution with The First Bottled Bourbon.

Name: Michter's US-1 Kentucky Straight Rye
Description: Celebrated for our dedication to rye, the very first whiskey in America, ever since our establishment in 1753, we approach the crafting of each and every Michter's Rye barrel with utmost care. Michter's US-1 Rye is meticulously created from carefully chosen American rye grain, which is sheared to enhance flavor saturation during fermentation. It is subsequently aged in a temperature-controlled warehouse. This exceptional rye offers notes of gentle spice, black pepper, marmalade, plum, spicy grains, and a touch of light caramel.

Name: Michter's US-1 Kentucky Straight Bourbon
Description: Michter's US-1 Bourbon is crafted from a meticulously chosen mashbill that showcases the finest American corn. It undergoes maturation until it reaches the pinnacle of excellence, often aging for more than eight years. An authentic 'small batch' spirit, each batch of our US*1 Bourbon is typically comprised of no more than two dozen barrels, allowing no room for masking imperfections and demanding excellence from every barrel. Embodying the essence of the Bluegrass State, Michter's US*1 Bourbon is characterized by its nuanced, smooth, and earthy profile.

Name: Four Roses Bourbon
Description: Four Roses Bourbon is an artful blend of up to 10 unique Bourbon recipes, delivering a versatile and approachable Bourbon that captivates both casual enthusiasts and devoted connoisseurs. Ideal for crafting exceptional cocktails. Crafted from a blend of up to 10 distinct Bourbon recipes. Bottled at 80 proof. Aged for a minimum of 5 years, ensuring quality and maturity.

Name: Four Roses Small Batch Bourbon
Description: Four Roses Small Batch masterfully blends four of our unique Bourbon recipes to achieve an exceptional balance that makes it perfect for savoring neat, over ice, or as the cornerstone of a meticulously crafted cocktail. It's a top-shelf essential. Crafted from a harmonious fusion of four distinct Bourbon recipes. Four Roses boasts a total of 10 Unique Bourbon Recipes. Bottled at 90 proof for a bold and flavorful experience. Aged for a minimum of 6 years, ensuring richness and maturity.

Name: Four Roses Single Barrel Bourbon
Description: Four Roses Single Barrel epitomizes high-rye Bourbon excellence, meticulously selected by our Master Distiller barrel by barrel, guided by maturation and flavor. Complexity born from a straightforward approach. Crafted exclusively from our OBSV recipe. Four Roses proudly offers 10 Unique Bourbon Recipes. Bottled at 100 proof for robust character and depth. Aged for 8-10 years, ensuring depth and maturity. A distinguished high-rye Bourbon for connoisseurs.

Name: Four Roses Small Batch Select Bourbon
Description: Discover the exceptional complexity of Four Roses Small Batch Select, a non-chill filtered Bourbon that masterfully combines six unique recipes, delivering an upper-premium experience with a one-of-a-kind, herbal-forward flavor profile that stands apart in the category. Crafted from a selection of six of our distinct Bourbon recipes. Four Roses proudly offers 10 unique Bourbon Recipes. Bottled at 104 proof for a robust, intense character. Aged for 6-7 years, ensuring a well-rounded maturity. Non-chill filtered for an unadulterated taste experience.
ImageLink: images/products/Four Roses Small Batch Select Bourbon.webp

Name: Four Roses Private Barrel Selection, Barrel Strength, OBSK
Description: Introducing the OBSK Recipe At Four Roses, we cherish the occasional discovery of exceptionally smooth and intricate barrels from any of our ten Bourbon recipes. These remarkable barrels, aged between 9 and 11 years, are handpicked by our Master Distiller.  We extend an exclusive invitation to our valued customers for a private tasting and the selection of their preferred barrels. Once chosen, each selection is bottled, bearing a personalized label as a non-chill filtered Single Barrel at Barrel Strength. Our supply of these exquisite selections is limited, making them even more special. OBSK Recipe Details: - Mashbill B: 60% Corn, 35% Rye, 5% Malted Barley with Slight Spice - Proprietary yeast strain adds a unique character to the blend.
ImageLink: images/products/Four Roses Private Barrel Selection, Barrel Strength, OBSK.webp

Name: Evan Williams Bourbon
Description: When it comes to exploring the world of American bourbons, your journey isn't complete until you've experienced Evan Williams Black. With roots dating back to 1783 along the picturesque banks of the Ohio River, Evan Williams proudly stands as one of the nation's oldest distilleries and Kentucky's very first bourbon distillery. Its rich history and closely guarded recipe make Evan Williams Black Label the quintessential Kentucky bourbon to satisfy your discerning palate. Upon cracking open a bottle of Evan Williams Black Label, your senses are immediately greeted by a lush bouquet of vanilla and invigorating mint. However, this is just the beginning of an exquisite journey. As it caresses your lips, you'll be delighted by subtle notes of oak, caramel, and brown sugar, which gracefully linger through the fulfilling finish. While some purists insist on savoring bourbon neat or over ice, Evan Williams Black Label readily lends itself to a myriad of sumptuous cocktails. For an all-American classic, indulge in an Evan and cola, or for a refreshing twist, try Evan and mineral water to enhance the flavors without any harsh edges. For those seeking a more adventurous flavor profile, the iconic mint julep or Manhattan cocktails transport you to the hallowed grounds of the Kentucky Derby or the bustling streets of the Big Apple, provided you're not already residing there. If not, don your mixologist hat and concoct your own signature libations with juices, sodas, and mixers, then christen them with the name of your hometown. Who knows, your unique creation, like the 'Des Moines Fury,' might just take the world by storm. Evan Williams Black Label empowers you to showcase your mixological creativity. Experience Evan Williams Black Label by purchasing it online via Drizly, where you can have it conveniently delivered to your doorstep or pick it up in-store.

Name: Evan Williams Bottled-in-Bond
Description: Our Kentucky Straight Bourbon is the embodiment of character and craftsmanship, executed flawlessly. Bearing the name of Evan Williams, the visionary who established Kentucky's inaugural distillery in 1783, this Bottled-In-Bond Bourbon stands as a testament to tradition and excellence. At a robust 100 proof, Evan Williams Bottled-In-Bond adheres rigorously to the stringent criteria set forth for Bottled-In-Bond products. It boasts a minimum aging period of four years, undergoes distillation within a single distilling season at a solitary distillery, and remains under the vigilant oversight of the U.S. government. The result is a bourbon of radiant golden hue. As you savor this remarkable bourbon, your senses will be tantalized by inviting aromas of caramel, complemented by subtle traces of vanilla, oak, and barley. Upon tasting, you'll encounter vibrant citrus notes dancing atop a symphony of vanilla and black pepper nuances. Evan Williams proudly holds the distinction of being the second-best-selling Kentucky Straight Bourbon brand worldwide. In 2019, Evan Williams Bottled-In-Bond received accolades in the form of a prestigious Gold award and the coveted Consumer's Choice SIP Award. Discover the unparalleled craftsmanship of Evan Williams by indulging in our Bottled-In-Bond Bourbon. Purchase it online today and experience the epitome of Kentucky bourbon heritage.

Name: Evan Williams Green Label Bourbon
Description: Our Kentucky Straight Bourbon exudes character and is the embodiment of perfection. It pays homage to the visionary Evan Williams, the trailblazer who inaugurated Kentucky's very first distillery back in 1783. It's no wonder that Evan Williams holds the prestigious position of being the world's second-best-selling Kentucky Straight Bourbon brand.

Name: Evan Williams Honey
Description: Evan Williams Honey unites the exquisite Evan Williams Bourbon, a renowned Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey brand ranked second in the world, with pure, all-natural honey. This fusion offers remarkable versatility, allowing you to relish it on its own or craft delightful, honey-infused cocktails.

Name: Evan Williams Single Barrel
Description: Evan Williams Single Barrel stands as the pioneer and sole vintage-dated Single Barrel Bourbon, securing its position as a five-time Whiskey of the Year award recipient. Each bottle is meticulously hand-numbered, indicating the specific barrel number, as well as the dates of barreling and bottling. In tribute to Evan Williams, the trailblazer behind Kentucky's First Distillery in 1783, our Bourbon boasts an 86.6 proof and a radiant amber gold hue. It entices the senses with enticing scents of dark caramel, sweet oak, and vanilla, while the palate enjoys a lavish and spiced encounter, highlighted by oak, honey, and vanilla accents.

Name: Evan Williams Cherry
Description: Evan Williams Cherry brings together the renowned Evan Williams Bourbon, the second best-selling Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey globally, with a delightful infusion of sweet cherry flavor. Evan Williams Cherry is incredibly versatile, suitable for sipping neat or as an essential ingredient in crafting revitalizing cocktails.

Name: Talisker 10 Year
Description: A timeless Island whisky hailing from the enchanting Isle of Skye. It consistently receives exceptional ratings, earning the prestigious title of Editor's Choice at Whisky Magazine. Expect a profusion of spices and invigorating, zesty peat flavors. This outstanding spirit was honored with a Double Gold award at the 2017 San Francisco World Spirits Competition.

Name: Talisker Storm
Description: Embark on an odyssey woven by the ocean's rhythm as you savor a dram of Talisker Storm Single Malt Scotch Whisky. Our 91.6 proof elixir begins with a gentle yet luxuriously sweet maltiness, culminating in a crescendo of spiciness. Crafted by the sea on the rugged shores of Scotland's Isle of Skye, the centuries-old distilling heritage and the untamed landscape converge to create our award-winning nectar. Its intensity and robustness stem from the peat used in malting and the profound vanilla bestowed by the maturation process. As you indulge in this elixir, relish its enduring, velvety finish, which unveils a symphony of sweet and spicy notes when sipped neat or with a dash of water. Nestled among the Inner Hebridean Scottish Isles, Skye is a land of stark contrasts, windswept shores, and unbridled beauty. Our whisky masterfully captures the essence of this island abode. In 1825, Hugh MacAskill of Eigg assumed ownership of Talisker House and, alongside his brother, erected what would become one of the world's most renowned distilleries on the shores of Loch Harport. Today, it stands as one of the oldest single malt Scotch whiskies produced by the sea. Despite enduring fires, wars, and financial turmoil, this northern sanctuary has remained resolute, consistently crafting remarkable whiskies that, once experienced, are forever etched in memory. Please enjoy responsibly.

Name: Bunnahabhain 12 Year Single Malt Whisky
Description: Bunnahabhain 12-year-old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky marked the inception of the Bunnahabhain collection, making a grand entrance to a chorus of accolades and admiration. Immerse yourself in the essence of Bunnahabhain, where a captivating equilibrium unfolds, embracing sweet fruits, nuttiness, vanilla, and a delicate whisper of the coastal environment. COLOR: Enveloped in a russet gold hue. NOSE: An invigorating and aromatic bouquet awaits, with fruity and floral notes, subtle hints of dried fruits, and a gentle undercurrent of smoke. PALATE: The palate reveals a lightness adorned with fruity undertones, nutty complexities, accompanied by a touch of sweetness, and delicate traces of vanilla and caramel. FINISH: The finale is a lingering, exquisitely rich, and full-bodied crescendo, leaving an indelible impression.

Name: Midnight Moon Apple Pie Moonshine
Description: Midnight Moon Apple Pie is a harmonious fusion of Midnight Moon, pure apple juice, and a delicate cinnamon stick. As these elements unite and mature, they craft a 70 proof (35% Alc./Vol.) elixir that faithfully captures the essence of a warm, homemade apple pie.

Name: Jeffersons Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Achieving balance and complexity doesn't have to break the bank. Our distinctive blend is carefully crafted from four bourbon styles, meticulously harmonized in limited quantities. The outcome? A subtly fruitier and remarkably refined flavor profile, culminating – as ever – in a velvety, vanilla-kissed grace that beckons for a second pour.

Name: Jefferson's Ocean Aged at Sea Bourbon
Description: Embark on a unique bourbon journey with our limited edition small batch Kentucky Bourbon. Aged in American oak for approximately 8 years on land, it then takes to the sea, resting for 5 to 10 months aboard a ship. The gentle sway of the waves, temperature shifts, and barometric variations coax additional wood tannins from the oak, resulting in an aroma bouquet reminiscent of vanilla, caramel, and charred matches.
ImageLink: images/products/Jefferson's Ocean Aged at Sea Bourbon.webp

Name: Bushmills Irish Whiskey
Description: Experience the exquisite blend of Bushmills® Original Irish Whiskey, a harmonious marriage of triple-distilled single malt whiskey and a lighter grain Irish whiskey. Aged for a minimum of 3 years in bourbon and European Sherry casks, it represents the pinnacle of Irish whiskey blending. Embrace the legacy of Ireland's inaugural whiskey distillery with this exceptional expression, recognized with 90 points by Wine Enthusiast.

Name: Tullamore D.E.W. Irish Whiskey
Description: Tullamore DEW, the timeless blended Irish whiskey, enjoys global acclaim for its graceful and intricate character. First and foremost, it undergoes a triple distillation process and matures patiently in a harmonious blend of ex-bourbon and sherry casks, culminating in its unique smoothness. Furthermore, as an amalgamation of all three varieties of Irish whiskey, it exudes a subtle complexity. The inclusion of malt and pot still whiskey contributes citrusy and spicy nuances to its flavor profile.

Name: Caol Ila 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
Description: Indulge in the luxurious flavor of Caol Ila 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky. This exquisite whisky offers a gentle, citrusy fruitiness with a sweet introduction, culminating in a protracted, subtly tart finish. To enhance the peaty and briny notes of Caol Ila, we recommend pairing our 86 proof whisky with a rustic olive dish like tapenade. The blend of capers and herbs in the tapenade complements the whisky's citrus undertones. Whether sipped on its own or used in a cocktail, our award-winning whisky is best savored in its pure form, poured into a rocks glass. Feel free to add ice or a dash of water to suit your taste. Pronounced as 'Cull Eela,' Caol Ila has a storied history. For over a century, small coal-fired vessels known as 'puffers,' such as the SS Pibroch, transported barley, coal, and empty casks to the distillery and returned with the precious whisky across the Sound of Islay. Today, Caol Ila's secluded bay remains a well-kept secret among devoted Islay enthusiasts. The barley used in our whisky is still malted locally in Port Ellen, and pure spring water continues to flow from limestone at nearby Loch Nam Ban, meandering to the sea at Caol Ila in a pristine crystal stream, as it has for generations.
ImageLink: images/products/Caol Ila 12 Year Single Malt Scotch.webp

Name: Glendalough Double Barrel Irish Whiskey
Description: Experience the excellence of this internationally acclaimed single grain whiskey, which has undergone a double maturation process. Initially aged in American oak Bourbon barrels, it undergoes a secondary maturation in Spanish oak Oloroso Sherry barrels. Prepare to reconsider your perceptions of Irish whiskey. The influence of the Bourbon barrels imparts a delightful sweetness and velvety vanilla notes, while the Oloroso casks contribute layers of rich dried fruit and the enticing spices of Spanish oak. Enjoy it straight, over ice, or with a splash of soda. This whiskey offers a sophisticated and versatile drinking experience that will captivate your palate.

Name: Sagamore Spirit Signature Rye Whiskey
Description: Each and every bottle of Sagamore Spirit Signature Straight Rye Whiskey is a product of the distinctive water sourced from our Spring House at Sagamore Farm. This water, meticulously filtered through a limestone aquifer, plays a pivotal role in creating a flawlessly balanced spirit. It possesses the versatility to shine in a variety of cocktails, yet its inherent smoothness beckons for sipping on its own.

Name: Redemption Straight Rye Whiskey
Description: Your initial encounter with Redemption Rye transcends mere sipping; it's an exploration of the intricate and captivating flavors of rye. Boasting an impressive rye content of 95%, far surpassing the 51% rye requirement, we've resurrected the quintessential American whiskey that once reigned supreme in our glasses before the days of Prohibition. It delivers the robust essence of genuine rye spice, embellished by subtle floral and citrus notes. While immensely gratifying when enjoyed on its own, its subtle minty conclusion renders it perfect for crafting distinctive cocktails like the Manhattan or Old Fashioned. '93 POINTS, Finalist & Great Value' - Ultimate Spirits Challenge

Name: Redemption Straight Bourbon Whiskey
TastingNotes: Anise, Caramel, Honey, Pepper, Woody, Yeasty
Description: A genuinely approachable bourbon, renowned for its nuanced 'rye-forward' character. Meticulously handcrafted, it embodies the essence of traditional American bourbons, boasting a harmonious sweetness underscored by rich nuances of vanilla and caramel. Yet, we've ventured further by infusing it with a 21% rye content, imparting a subtle yet unmistakable touch of spice. Whether sipped leisurely over ice or expertly blended into cocktails, it stands as a versatile bourbon. '91 POINTS' - LA International Wine & Spirits Competition

Name: Redemption Straight High-Rye Bourbon
TastingNotes: Berry, Fruity, Mint, Oak, Pepper, Spicy, Woody
Description: When we say 'High Rye,' we mean business. Redemption High Rye Bourbon boasts an impressive 36% rye content, setting it apart from other bourbons. This distinctive composition yields a captivating fusion of flavors, where the gentle sweetness of traditional bourbon meets the bold, spicy notes of rye. Subtle hints of vanilla and caramel gracefully balance its 'rye-forward' profile, making it equally suited for sipping or crafting timeless cocktails. If you crave an audacious bourbon experience, your search ends here. '91 Points - 2020, San Diego International Wine and Spirits Challenge'

Name: Aberlour 12 Year
Description: The Aberlour 12-year-old whisky is a remarkable showcase of Aberlour's unique spirit, characterized by a crisply vibrant, citrusy essence that undergoes a skillful transformation through dual cask aging. The marriage of traditional oak and Sherry-seasoned butts works harmoniously to impart a refined and delicately balanced flavor profile to the matured spirits within. This results in a whisky with a subtle and harmonious taste experience that embodies the best of both cask types.

Name: Aberlour A'Bunadh
Description: Aberlour A'bunadh, lovingly handcrafted in small batches, stands as an exceptional cask strength whisky revered by whisky aficionados worldwide. Its name, 'the original' in Gaelic, pays tribute to Aberlour's visionary founder, James Fleming, who insisted on preserving tradition by shunning modern processes like chill filtration. This commitment to heritage yields a whisky of unparalleled richness and creaminess, setting it apart from the ordinary. Prepare to be captivated by its unforgettable, intensely fruity raisin notes, a testament to its remarkable and memorable flavor profile. Aberlour A'bunadh is a true masterpiece, steeped in tradition and cherished by discerning palates.

Name: George Dickel Bottled in Bond Distilling Season 2008 Tennessee Whisky
Description: George Dickel Bottled in Bond Distilling Season 2008 Tennessee Whisky represents a testament to the unwavering commitment of Cascade Hollow Distilling Co. to the art of crafting exceptional whisky. With an impressive 11-year aging process, this is the second release of our Bottled in Bond collection, sourced from barrels that have matured since the fall of 2008. This limited-edition whisky boasts a remarkable balance and complexity, tantalizing the palate with distinctive notes of pecan, maple syrup, and dried apple. Whether enjoyed neat, over ice, or in a classic Old Fashioned cocktail with sugar, bitters, and an orange twist, it promises an unparalleled drinking experience. 'Bottled In Bond' is not just a label; it's a symbol of authenticity rooted in the Bottled-in-Bond Act of 1897, a response to the era's widespread whisky adulteration. This designation guarantees the genuineness of the spirit. To earn this classification, the whisky must be aged for a minimum of four years in a federally bonded warehouse under rigorous U.S. government oversight. It must also bear the identity of the single distillery where it was both distilled and bottled. Our Bottled in Bond Distilling Season 2008 whisky is a unique creation distilled at the Cascade Hollow Distillery. It's an exceptional libation, meticulously crafted and thoroughly deserving of your discerning taste. As always, please enjoy responsibly.
ImageLink: images/products/George Dickel Bottled in Bond Distilling Season 2008 Tennessee Whisky.webp

Name: George Dickel No. 8 Whiskey
Description: George Dickel No. 8 Sour Mash Tennessee Whisky is a remarkable embodiment of depth, character, and flavor. Our 80-proof whisky boasts a distinctive profile characterized by harmonious notes of light caramel, rich maple, and nuanced wood flavors, culminating in a luxuriously smooth and smoky finish. What sets this blend apart is its meticulous production process, a homage to our founder, George Dickel. We adhere to a chilled charcoal-mellowed method that imparts a unique character to this exceptional whisky. The result is a spirit with a complex flavor profile and a finish that lingers on the palate. George Dickel No. 8 whisky is not only perfect for savoring on its own but also for elevating your favorite cocktails. For a refreshing twist, simply mix it with lemonade, pour over ice in a rocks glass, and garnish with a slice of lemon, creating the delightful Dickelade cocktail. Our tradition of chilling the whisky before filtering it through sugar-maple charcoal pays homage to George Dickel's discovery that whisky produced in the cold winter months possessed exceptional smoothness. We remain committed to this tradition, believing it contributes to the creation of an exquisite whisky that we trust you'll appreciate. As always, please enjoy responsibly.

Name: Bulleit Bourbon
Description: Bulleit Bourbon draws its inspiration from the whiskey crafted by the pioneering spirit of Augustus Bulleit over a century and a half ago. Upholding our unwavering commitment to excellence, only the finest ingredients find their way into our bourbon. The complexity that defines Bulleit Bourbon arises from its unique composition, blending rye, corn, and barley malt with special yeast strains and pristine Kentucky limestone-filtered water. It's this distinctive high rye content that bestows upon Bulleit Bourbon its daring, spicy character and a remarkably clean and smooth finish. In appearance, our bourbon showcases a medium amber hue, offering a gentle interplay of spiciness and sweet oak aromas. As you savor it, the mid-palate unfolds smoothly, revealing nuances of maple, oak, and nutmeg. The finish, both enduring and velvety, leaves behind a subtle toffee essence that lingers long after your final sip. Bulleit Bourbon invites you to explore its versatility, whether enjoyed neat or incorporated into classic cocktails like the comforting Hot Toddy, where it harmonizes with cloves, lemon juice, brown sugar, and hot water. Remaining true to our heritage, Bulleit Bourbon continues to be distilled and aged in accordance with the time-honored Bulleit family tradition. With its high rye content delivering a bold, spicy character and a distinctly smooth, clean finish, our bourbon stands as a testament to our commitment to quality. As always, please savor responsibly.

Name: Bulleit Rye
Description: Indulge in the remarkable, robust character of Bulleit 95 Rye Whiskey. From its russet hue to its enticing oaky bouquet, our straight rye whiskey leaves a lasting impression, even before your first sip. The flavor profile of our rye whiskey sets the stage for an experience like no other, offering a distinctively clean finish that lingers long after your final sip. Whether enjoyed neat or as the key ingredient in a classic Manhattan cocktail, combining our rye whiskey with sweet vermouth, a dash of bitters, and a cherry is a surefire way to elevate your tasting experience. Remaining true to the revered Bulleit family tradition, Bulleit 95 Rye Whiskey embodies our enduring commitment to quality. Rye enthusiasts will appreciate that rye has always been at the heart of our craft. In this proud tradition, we present Bulleit 95 Rye Whiskey, a straight rye whiskey crafted from 95% rye and 5% malted barley. This unique blend continues to garner recognition as one of the finest ryes available. As with all our offerings, we encourage you to savor Bulleit 95 Rye Whiskey responsibly.

Name: Bulleit Bourbon 10 Year
Description: Discover the rich character and intricate finish of Bulleit Bourbon 10 Year Old Whiskey. From its deep russet hue to its enticing oaky bouquet, our aged whiskey leaves an indelible impression, even before the bottle is uncorked. The flavor profile of our bourbon whiskey is a harmonious blend of vanilla and dried fruit, culminating in a robust, smoky finish that lingers on the palate. Aged meticulously in charred American white oak barrels, select Bulleit Bourbon barrels were carefully set aside for a decade, resulting in an expression of Bulleit that boasts bold character and a multifaceted finish. Whether savored neat or crafted into a soothing Hot Toddy by combining our bourbon whiskey with cloves, lemon juice, brown sugar, and hot water, each sip is a testament to our unwavering dedication to the Bulleit family tradition. Renowned for its high rye content, our bourbon exhibits a daring, spicy character underscored by a remarkably smooth and clean finish. This distinctive character is shaped by the pristine Kentucky limestone-filtered water that lays the foundation for our whiskey, and the charred American oak barrels that impart a smoky depth. We encourage you to enjoy Bulleit Bourbon 10 Year Old Whiskey responsibly, savoring every moment of this exceptional expression.

Name: Bulleit Single Barrel Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Crafted in the heart of Kentucky using only the finest ingredients, this innovative release represents a barrel strength iteration of the renowned Bulleit Bourbon, maintaining the exceptional high-rye mash bill that defines our brand. Bulleit Barrel Strength has been acclaimed as the Best Straight Bourbon and proudly earned a coveted Double Gold Medal at the prestigious 2018 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Further adding to its accolades, it garnered an impressive score of 92 at the 2017 Ultimate Spirits Challenge, continuing our storied tradition of sharing exceptional, award-winning whiskeys with the world.
ImageLink: images/products/Bulleit Single Barrel Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Fireside Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Fireside Straight Bourbon is meticulously aged for a minimum of 2 years in pristine new American Oak barrels, charred to a level 3 perfection. Our bourbon proudly features locally sourced Colorado corn, Colorado rye, and malted barley, all thoughtfully fermented with our proprietary, home-grown yeast. The culmination of our craftsmanship is achieved through the art of distillation in a custom copper still. The result is a bourbon with inviting smoky undertones and a flavor profile that boasts a harmonious blend of smoothness and robust character. It's the perfect companion for those cherished moments spent gathered around a crackling fire with dear friends.

Name: Lagavulin 16 Year
Description: Indulge in the remarkable flavors of Scotland's rugged islands with a sip of Lagavulin 16 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky. Our 86 proof whisky delivers an intense, full-bodied experience reminiscent of a driftwood fire gently crackling at dusk. The profound taste of dry peat smoke, intertwined with robust maritime notes, creates a multifaceted dram that culminates in a long and graceful finish. Crafted with precision in Lagavulin, Scotland, nestled along the enchanting coast of Islay, our whisky epitomizes centuries of local distilling mastery. The recognition of our exceptional quality is underscored by the Double Gold Medal awarded at the 2017 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Our whisky matures in oak casks, imparting it with the extraordinary and timeless smoky essence that demands to be savored in the classic whisky glass, either neat or with a delicate splash of water. Continuing a rich 200-year-old tradition of distillation excellence, the Lagavulin distillery stands proudly as one of Islay's oldest. Originally established by farmer John Johnston in 1816 and later stewarded by Peter Mackies in 1887, the name Lagavulin has become synonymous with the artistry of Islay malts. Vast expanses of peat bogs on the western reaches of the island provide the raw material that infuses our barley with the iconic smoky character. The pristine peat-rich water flowing from the Solan Lochs into the distillery further contributes to our whisky's distinctive flavors. Great whisky is a testament to patience, and in Islay, we treasure this virtue. Rushing the art of crafting exceptional whisky is simply not in our nature. Please savor Lagavulin responsibly.

Name: Lagavulin 8 Year
Description: Embark on a journey to the enchanting Scottish islands and explore the exceptional flavors of Lagavulin 8 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky. Our exclusive limited edition, boasting a formidable 96 proof, invites you to savor the intense, full-bodied essence reminiscent of charred, mint-infused dark chocolate. These captivating flavors gracefully linger, culminating in a clean, enduring finish. Crafted with precision in Lagavulin, Scotland, nestled along the storied coast of Islay, our whisky is a testament to centuries of local distillation traditions. Our oak cask aging process imparts the whisky with the extraordinary and timeless smoky character that demands to be appreciated in a whisky nosing glass, whether enjoyed neat or with a delicate addition of water. Continuing a rich 200-year-old tradition of distillation excellence, the Lagavulin distillery stands proudly as one of Islay's oldest. Originally established by farmer John Johnston in 1816 and later stewarded by Peter Mackies in 1887, the name Lagavulin has become synonymous with the artistry of Islay malts. The vast expanses of peat bogs on the western reaches of the island provide the raw material that infuses our barley with the iconic smoky character. The pristine, peat-rich water flowing from the Solan Lochs into the distillery further contributes to our whisky's distinctive flavors. In Islay, we cherish the virtue of patience. Crafting exceptional whisky is a labor of love that cannot be rushed. Please savor Lagavulin responsibly.

Name: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky
Description: Introducing Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, a legend in its own right. Picture yourself in a face-off with a fire-breathing dragon, savoring the fiery aftermath of its feast on a whisky barrel brimming with spicy cinnamon. It's an experience that transcends description, delivering a taste that's nothing short of heavenly yet with a blazing intensity that rivals the inferno itself. What unfolds next is entirely in your hands. What you're holding is a harmonious blend of velvety whisky and the scorching embrace of red-hot cinnamon. Fireball Whisky is at its finest when enjoyed as an ice-cold shot, delivering an exhilarating rush of flavor that defies convention. For those seeking an alternative path to ignite their evening, consider pairing it with your preferred mixer – whether it's cola, ginger beer, hard cider, cranberry, or any other concoction you desire. Fireball has a transformative effect, elevating every sip to new heights of deliciousness. Embrace the fire within and let Fireball Cinnamon Whisky set your taste buds ablaze.

Name: Basil Hayden's Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Indulge in the extraordinary complexity of Basil Hayden's® Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey, a meticulously crafted spirit born in the heart of bourbon country, Clermont, Kentucky. This bourbon, a testament to its small-batch origins, unveils a rich tapestry of scents and flavors that beckon the senses. As you take in its essence, you'll encounter the delightful fragrance of peppermint, followed by subtle notes of pepper and a delicate hint of citrus dancing gracefully on the palate. The journey culminates in a warm, spicy crescendo that leaves a lasting impression. Whether savored neat, over ice, in a timeless Manhattan, or an Old Fashioned classic, Basil Hayden's® promises an experience like no other. For those seeking a twist on tradition, consider sipping it in a Mint Julep or Bourbon Mary, where the aroma intertwines with a light-bodied, honey-kissed foundation and a gentle, inviting bite. Meticulously aged and bottled at 80 proof, Basil Hayden's® boasts a unique distinction—utilizing twice the rye content compared to its bourbon counterparts, resulting in a bourbon with a mild yet tantalizing spiciness. Elevate your bourbon journey with Basil Hayden's®, a masterpiece in the world of small-batch bourbon.
ImageLink: images/products/Basil Hayden's Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Basil Hayden's Dark Rye Whiskey
Description: Basil Hayden's® Bourbon, celebrated for its distinctive high-rye recipe, embarks on an innovative journey, delving into the art of blending. This new release showcases the seamless fusion of TWO DISTINCT RYE WHISKIES, artfully infused with a HINT OF PORT, introducing an entirely NOVEL FLAVOR EXPERIENCE. The culmination of this blend presents a symphony of three unique liquid profiles, crafting a whiskey that lingers in memory. The foundation begins with Kentucky Rye, imparting a robust essence of spicy rye, enriched oak, dried fruit, and subtle molasses nuances, setting a solid stage. Expertly interwoven is Canadian Rye from our acclaimed Alberta Distillery, infusing the composition with depth, accentuating the notes of dried fruit, and lending a luxuriously viscous mouthfeel that transcends conventional ryes. To enhance this masterpiece, a delicate touch of California Port is harmoniously integrated, imparting a complementary burst of succulent, ripe fruit while preserving the integrity of the prevailing woody notes. The outcome is a whiskey teeming with flavor, characterized by its nuanced intricacies. BASIL HAYDEN'S® DARK RYE emerges as a whiskey of unbridled richness, perfect for savoring on the rocks or as a key component in the classic Boulevardier cocktail. Explore the artistry of whiskey-making with this exceptional creation, a testament to our commitment to crafting exceptional spirits.

Name: The Famous Grouse Scotch Whisky
TastingNotes: Biscuit, Caramel, Dried Fruit, Smooth, Vanilla
Description: For over four decades, The Famous Grouse has held its place as Scotland's beloved whisky, cherished for its unwavering dedication to unparalleled quality and unmatched smoothness. This iconic whisky is the product of a masterful blend, expertly combining the finest malts and extraordinary grain whiskies. Each cask chosen for the creation of this renowned whisky undergoes meticulous nosing before the harmonious blending process begins. The outcome is a whisky of remarkable taste, graced with distinctive notes of dried fruit, velvety shortbread, and the subtle embrace of oak spice. These flavors converge to deliver an exceptionally smooth and impeccably balanced finish that lingers on the palate. Whether sipped neat, over ice, or featured in classic cocktails such as the Hot Toddy, Penicillin, or Scotch and Soda, The Famous Grouse stands as a testament to the artistry of whisky-making. Embrace the legacy of Scotland's favorite whisky and relish in its timeless excellence.

Name: Hudson Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Hudson Baby Bourbon stands as a trailblazer, proudly holding the title of the very first bourbon ever crafted in the heart of New York State. Our bourbon is a testament to the fertile lands of the state, exclusively made from 100% New York State corn. Its distinctive rich amber hue and robust personality are the result of our meticulous aging process in new charred American oak barrels. We take pride in offering you this full-flavored, effortlessly sippable whiskey, perfect for sharing cherished moments with friends. This bourbon is nothing short of a bold and resounding masterpiece, harmoniously adorned with hints of vanilla and caramel that dance on your palate. It's a taste of New York's spirit, crafted for your enjoyment.

Name: Teeling Small Batch Irish Whiskey
Description: Small Batch stands as our flagship Irish whiskey, boldly redefining the boundaries of what an Irish Whiskey can truly embody. This exquisite bottling is a testament to the art of whiskey-making, comprising carefully hand-selected casks that undergo a secondary maturation process in ex-rum barrels. This transformative journey infuses the liquid with an unparalleled character and a velvety, harmonious flavor that is truly distinctive. Bottled at a robust 46% ABV and devoid of any chill filtration, this Irish whiskey exudes an authenticity and character that are second to none. The experience begins with an inviting aroma that tantalizes the senses. A delightful interplay of vanilla and spice mingles gracefully with the vibrant, sweet nuances of rum. Upon sipping, the influence of the rum cask becomes apparent, yet the whiskey remains incredibly approachable. The higher alcohol content contributes to a unique, velvety smoothness, marked by sweet, slightly woody undertones that dance on the palate. As you savor this exceptional spirit, a delightful hint of sweet spice lingers on the palate, culminating in a finish that is nothing short of remarkable. Small Batch Irish Whiskey is an exquisite testament to the artistry of whiskey-making, offering a flavor journey that is both intriguing and satisfying.

Name: Redbreast 12 Year
Description: Replete with rich aromas and an abundance of flavor, Redbreast 12 Year Old is a whiskey of unparalleled character. Its exceptional profile owes much to the significant influence of distillates that have undergone maturation in Oloroso sherry casks, bestowing upon it the distinctive essence reminiscent of a Christmas cake. As you embark on this sensory journey, your olfactory senses will be greeted by a multifaceted bouquet that combines intricate spices and fruity notes, all interwoven with hints of toasted wood. Upon tasting, you will encounter a tapestry of full-bodied and intricate flavors. This harmonious symphony unfolds with a delicate equilibrium of spiciness, creaminess, fruitiness, sherry undertones, and gentle notes of toasted wood. The culmination of this remarkable whiskey experience is a gratifyingly long finish that allows the complexity of flavors to linger tantalizingly on your palate, leaving an indelible impression of excellence. Redbreast 12 Year Old is truly a whiskey that encapsulates the artistry of its craft in every sip.

Name: Widow Jane 10 Year Straight Bourbon
Description: Widow Jane Whiskey embodies the wisdom shared by renowned whiskey distillers worldwide, from the rolling hills of Kentucky to the scenic landscapes of Scotland. At the heart of this exceptional whiskey lies the essence of sweet water sourced from resilient rock formations, a testament to the essence of exceptional whiskey-making. This meticulously aged 10-year whiskey attains a level of perfection that rivals even the most seasoned 20-year bourbons. Each sip reveals a symphony of flavors, characterized by the profound presence of cherry notes that dance on the palate, culminating in a gracefully light tannic finish. Widow Jane Whiskey is a testament to the artistry and dedication that go into crafting truly remarkable spirits.

Name: Oban 14 Year Single Malt
Description: Oban 14 Year Single Malt, a testament to time-honored craftsmanship, emerges from one of Scotland's most storied and enduring distilleries. With a legacy dating back to the 1790s when visionary founders John and Hugh Stevenson established their brewery and the now-iconic Oban Distillery, this charming coastal town of Oban in the West Highlands was transformed into a bustling seaside retreat. For nearly a century, the distillery remained in the steadfast hands of the Stevenson family until its acquisition and revitalization by J. Walter Higgin. Today, well over a century later, the Oban Distillery stands as a living tribute to Higgin's meticulous refurbishment, preserving its authenticity through time. Oban 14 Year Single Malt is meticulously crafted using 100-percent barley, adhering faithfully to the distillery's precise standards. This process involves fermenting malted barley in small-batch, lantern-shaped copper stills before nurturing the whisky in oak casks. During its maturation, the whisky undergoes a transformation shaped by its coastal surroundings, basking in the embrace of warm, saline Gulf Stream breezes and a temperate climate. The outcome is a full-bodied, exquisitely dry scotch whisky, characterized by notes of honey and sun-dried figs that gracefully lead to a gentle, oak-kissed finale. Wondering how to savor Oban 14 Year Single Malt? Relish it neat or over ice, allowing its sweet, opulent bouquet to enchant your senses with whispers of citrus, succulent pears, subtle hints of seaweed, nautical ropes, and a delicate kiss of sea salt, all gracefully underpinned by a hint of peat. The enduring finish unveils itself with the caress of dry oak and lingering fruitiness. For those who seek to unlock its complexities, a drop of water gently swirled can unveil its lush, oily textures and heightened smoothness. You can procure Oban 14 Year Single Malt conveniently online at an attractive price through Drizly, with the option of doorstep delivery or in-store pickup. Experience the essence of authenticity and celebrate a timeless classic that earned the coveted Gold award at the 2017 San Francisco World Spirits Competition.

Name: Weller Special Reserve Bourbon
Description: Embrace The Original Wheated Bourbon Whiskey, a masterpiece known for its unparalleled smoothness achieved through the unique substitution of wheat in lieu of traditional rye grain. Bottled at a formidable 90 proof, this bourbon captivates with its warm burnt orange hue. Its gentle and inviting flavor profile renders it a splendid choice for savoring neat or as the foundation for crafting exquisite cocktails.

Name: Weller Antique 107 Bourbon
Description: Upon the first encounter, you'll be greeted by a vibrant burst of spices, followed by delicate undertones of vanilla, caramel, and butterscotch. As you delve deeper, the aromas of leather and nutmeg, along with subtle traces of cinnamon, will unfold. What truly surprises is the pronounced oak essence, a remarkable presence for a bourbon of its youth. For those with a keen sense of smell, a subtle hint of sweet barbecue sauce may even grace your olfactory senses.

Name: Weller 12yr Bourbon
Description: William Larue Weller, a true pioneer in the world of Kentucky whiskey, is credited with introducing the 'wheated' bourbon recipe, a revolutionary departure from the traditional rye-based mashbill. His lifelong dedication to educating consumers about the distinctive qualities of his bourbon lives on, as the brand continues to deliver exceptional wheated bourbon at an honest price. As a distinguished member of the wheated bourbon family, this twelve-year-old W.L. Weller undergoes a notably extended aging process, surpassing the majority of wheated bourbons. The result is a remarkably smooth, harmonious, and well-balanced bourbon, showcasing a captivating deep bronze hue. Tasting Notes: On the nose, expect a symphony of aromas featuring lanolin, almond, creamed corn, and toasty vanilla. The mid-palate experience is richly wheated, multi-layered, and moderately sweet. The finish is impressively long, oak-forward, and extraordinarily smooth.

Name: 1792 Small Batch Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: 1792 Small Batch Bourbon is meticulously handcrafted from the finest ingredients, including corn, rye, and malted barley, employing a distinctive high rye mash-bill. Aging exclusively in the uppermost levels of our aging warehouses and being extracted only when reaching peak maturity, our Master Distiller takes great care in personally selecting barrels for the creation of this small batch bourbon. With a robust yet remarkably smooth flavor profile at 93.7 proof, 1792 Small Batch is a bourbon that can be relished neat, over ice, or as the cornerstone of your preferred classic bourbon cocktail. Elevate your expectations with 1792. Tasting Notes: The complexity of its aroma is marked by quintessential bourbon characteristics, featuring velvety vanilla, luscious caramel, and profound oak. On the palate, a robust rye spiciness harmonizes with rich dark fruit and sweet caramel. The finish is enduring, leaving subtle traces of cocoa.
ImageLink: images/products/1792 Small Batch Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: 1792 Full Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Seasoned bourbon connoisseurs have long acknowledged the exceptional and opulent flavor of full-proof bourbon. In the crafting of this bourbon, a unique filtration process was employed, eschewing the conventional chill filtration and opting for passage solely through a plate and frame filter. This distinctive approach allowed the bourbon to retain its formidable proof for bottling, preserving its rich, full, and bold flavor. Bottled at the original 125 barrel entry proof, mirroring the conditions of years past when these barrels were initially filled, 1792 Full Proof Bourbon stands as an exceptionally distinctive expression. Tasting Notes: Exhibiting strength and an abundance of flavor, this assertive bourbon delivers an immensely deep and smoky taste, impeccably counterbalanced by luscious vanilla and nuances of caramel.
ImageLink: images/products/1792 Full Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Booker's Bourbon
Description: Booker's Bourbon takes its rightful place within the distinguished Jim Beam Small Batch Collection. Straight from the barrel, it remains uncut and unfiltered. This exceptional Bourbon, characterized by its rarity, is most exquisitely savored in its pure form. Immerse yourself in the complex symphony of flavors, including prominent notes of oak tannin, smoky vanilla, mocha, and coffee, all culminating in a finish that is both crisp and profoundly intense.

Name: Little Book Bourbon Chapter 3 “The Road Home”
Description: Freddie Noe, the 8th Generation Beam Family Distiller, has bestowed upon us the Little Book series of limited-edition bourbons, bearing the endearing childhood moniker given to him by his beloved grandfather and master distiller, Booker Noe. In this third chapter, known as the 'Road Home' edition, a harmonious blend awaits your discerning palate. It comprises nine-year-old Knob Creek and Basil Hayden's Bourbons, an 11-year-old Booker's Bourbon, and a 12-year-old Baker's Bourbon. This batch is an homage to my grandfather, and the name 'Little Book' is a nod to the cherished nickname he bestowed upon me. After crafting a couple of chapters, I felt it was the perfect time to pay tribute to him by amalgamating some of the exceptional spirits he contributed to the bourbon industry. The four exquisite liquids featured in 'The Road Home' batch hail from the original small batch collection created by my grandfather, Booker. As with all Little Book creations, these spirits are presented at their purest, bottled at barrel strength. 'The Road Home' references the very route I traverse regularly, the same path my grandfather, Booker, tread during his tenure at the distillery. I embarked on a journey of experimentation, meticulously crafting and evaluating 57 different recipes before discovering the one that encapsulated my vision. What I sought was a symphony of flavors, a tapestry woven with notes of vanilla, char, and dried apricots, all embraced by the enduring warmth of oak. The ultimate recipe, the 51st of the 57 attempts, demanded extensive trial and error. Yet, I believed that when venturing into the realm of the liquids my grandfather had so masterfully nurtured, nothing short of perfection would suffice.
ImageLink: images/products/Little Book Bourbon Chapter 3 “The Road Home”.webp

Name: Booker's 30th Anniversary Bourbon
Description: Three decades ago, my father, Booker Noe, unveiled the inaugural batch of his eponymous Booker's® Bourbon, a testament to his vision of the quintessential whiskey. In commemoration of Dad's enduring legacy and the joyous occasion of three decades graced by the exquisite whiskey he crafted, we are elated to present a remarkable limited edition – Booker's® 30th Anniversary Bourbon. As the 7th Generation Master Distiller of the Beam Family, I, Fred Noe, stand proudly in honoring my father's remarkable contribution to the world of bourbon. This release is our heartfelt homage to a remarkable man and his exceptional creation. In recent years, certain sections of our rackhouses in Clermont beckoned for renovation, necessitating the removal of weathered floorboards. However, it felt like an act of sacrilege to discard these tangible remnants of history. Instead, we opted to preserve this invaluable heritage for a special purpose. Each box containing Booker's® 30th Anniversary Bourbon is meticulously handcrafted from the very wood planks that once graced the floors where legends like Booker and Fred Noe trod. It was on these hallowed grounds that they meticulously selected batches of Booker's, thus imbuing this bourbon with the spirit of their enduring legacy. This extraordinary bourbon is our heartfelt tribute to Booker Noe's unrivaled craftsmanship, and we invite you to savor its rich history and exquisite flavor. Join us in raising a glass to celebrate 30 years of damn good whiskey – a legacy that continues to thrive and inspire.

Name: Booker's Front Porch Batch
Description: Introducing 'Booker's Front Porch,' the distinguished third batch of our esteemed 2017 limited release series. This bourbon has matured gracefully for a duration of 6 years, 5 months, and 25 days, resulting in a remarkable and finely crafted spirit. As you raise the glass to your lips, anticipate a symphony of aromas, where toasted butterscotch takes center stage. Upon tasting, you'll encounter a well-balanced palate that dances gracefully across your senses. The experience culminates in a short yet satisfying finish that leaves you craving another sip. 'Booker's Front Porch' is more than just bourbon; it's an invitation to savor moments of relaxation and camaraderie. Whether you choose to enjoy it alone or in the company of cherished friends, this bourbon is perfect for unhurried sipping. Allow it to transport you to the serenity of a front porch, where time seems to slow down, and the world outside fades away.

Name: Belle Meade Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Experience the exceptional and distinctive flavor of Belle Meade Bourbon Whiskey, a true small-batch masterpiece meticulously crafted to stand out. This extraordinary bourbon is the result of a proprietary blend, skillfully combining various high-rye-content mash bills and harmonious yeast strains. Each bottle of Belle Meade Bourbon contains the essence of our flagship Tennessee whiskey, patiently aged for six to eight years within carefully selected bourbon casks sourced from the nation's most esteemed distilleries. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every sip, as we never subject our bourbon to chill filtration, preserving the richness of its award-winning signature flavor profile.  Delve into a world of flavors as you savor the notes of maple syrup and caramel, accompanied by delicate floral fragrances and a hint of citrus zest. The journey continues with the emergence of vanilla and caramel flavors, accented by the bold spice of rye and subtle apricot undertones. When enjoyed neat or on the rocks, this bourbon offers a long and velvety finish adorned with the soothing embrace of cherry and plum, complemented by a touch of cinnamon. Notably absent is the harsh burn often associated with other 90 proof bourbons. Belle Meade Bourbon is a versatile companion for your imbibing adventures. Its elevated rye content and 90.4 proof strength enable it to shine even in cocktails where other bourbons might fade into the background. Whether you're crafting classic bourbon cocktails or sipping it straight, Belle Meade Bourbon promises an unforgettable taste journey. We take pride in bottling this exceptional bourbon right here in the heart of Tennessee. As you indulge in the pleasures of Belle Meade Bourbon, we kindly remind you to enjoy responsibly.

Name: Buchanan's DeLuxe Aged 12 Years Blended Scotch Whisky
Description: Crafted with over a century of expertise, Buchanan's Deluxe Aged 12 Years Blended Scotch Whisky is your guarantee to elevate any occasion to a new level of celebration. At 80 proof, our whisky unveils a harmonious symphony of flavors, featuring captivating notes of citric fruits and honey, which gracefully dance on your palate. The result is a whisky with a sweet and velvety character, accentuated by hints of orange and chocolate. Our luxury whisky is meticulously crafted to the highest standards, delivering a vibrant and distinctive character that speaks to the legacy of our artistry. Patiently matured for 12 years, our deluxe blend offers a lighter and more approachable profile compared to denser whiskies. Buchanan's Deluxe Aged 12 Years, our most iconic blend, stands as a testament to our commitment to excellence, consistently earning recognition and accolades. Whether enjoyed neat or as a key ingredient in a mixed drink, this award-winning whisky is a testament to the art of blending. For a delightful twist, try it in a Buchanita cocktail: simply combine it with pineapple juice, pour over ice, and garnish with fresh fruit. Every bottle of Buchanan's is the culmination of over 130 years of distillation mastery, resulting in a refined and gentle liquid that delights the senses. It strikes the perfect balance between smoothness and complexity, ensuring each sip is a journey of exquisite taste. We invite you to savor Buchanan's Deluxe Aged 12 Years Blended Scotch Whisky responsibly and experience the brilliance it imparts to your palate. Please drink responsibly.
ImageLink: images/products/Buchanan's DeLuxe Aged 12 Years Blended Scotch Whisky.webp

Name: Early Times Kentucky Whisky
Description: In the year 1860, Early Times® Kentucky Whisky had its humble beginnings in a locale known as Early Times Station, Kentucky. Today, our legacy lives on, carrying forth the tradition of exceptional whisky craftsmanship. Our whisky undergoes a meticulous process, starting with double distillation, followed by aging for a minimum of three years within heat-cycled warehouses. It matures gracefully, nestled in seasoned American white oak barrels at the Early Times Distillery, located in the heart of Shively, Kentucky. Early Times® Kentucky Whisky has earned its esteemed reputation for consistently delivering a premium whisky experience. It boasts a smooth and harmonious taste, characterized by a distinct flavor profile that remains unwavering over time. We take pride in providing this exceptional whisky to our valued consumers, offering both quality and affordability. Choose Early Times® Kentucky Whisky for a timeless taste of tradition, crafted with care and dedication in every drop. Elevate your whisky experience with Early Times®.

Name: Southern Comfort Original
Description: Southern Comfort Original draws its inspiration from the original 1874 recipe crafted by our founder. It captures the essence of core whiskey notes, intertwining them with iconic fruit and spice accents to create a truly distinctive flavor. Best enjoyed when paired with mainstream mixers or used as a key ingredient in cocktails, Southern Comfort Original has a remarkable ability to bring people together, much like the warm camaraderie of our beloved hometown. Tasting Notes: At its core, you'll encounter the rich whiskey notes, harmoniously accompanied by the unmistakable and iconic accents of fruit and spice. Experience the timeless tradition of Southern Comfort Original, where the past meets the present in every sip.

Name: Southern Comfort 100 Proof
Description: For over 140 years, we've dedicated ourselves to the art of crafting exceptionally smooth whiskey. Our journey began in 1874 when our visionary founder, M.W. Heron, introduced the world to Southern Comfort. He proudly declared, 'None Genuine But Mine,' a sentiment that still holds true today. Southern Comfort remains a premium whiskey, celebrated for its bold and harmonious character. It boasts the core whiskey notes that discerning enthusiasts seek, intertwined with lively accents of caramel and fruit. This masterful blend is a testament to our commitment to delivering an unforgettable New Orleans experience. Whether sipped neat, over ice, or artfully mixed into classic cocktails, Southern Comfort caters to true whiskey lovers who crave that extra touch of New Orleans flair. Tasting Notes: Indulge in the bold and balanced flavors that encompass the essence of whiskey, complemented by the vivacious interplay of caramel and fruit accents. Discover the true spirit of Southern Comfort with each sip.

Name: Southern Comfort Black
Description: For over 140 years, we've been dedicated to the craft of creating exceptionally smooth whiskey. Our journey began in 1874 when our visionary founder, M.W. Heron, introduced the world to Southern Comfort. His timeless mantra, 'None Genuine But Mine,' still resonates today, as whiskey connoisseurs worldwide seek the unmistakable and smooth flavor of Southern Comfort. Our 80-proof whiskey presents a robust-forward profile elevated by subtle spice and fruity accents. It takes the original Southern Comfort experience to the next level, catering to those who appreciate their extra-smooth whiskey with an extra-bold character. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as the heart of a classic cocktail, this expression of Southern Comfort is sure to impress. Tasting Notes: Experience a whiskey-forward journey enriched by delicate notes of spice and fruit. Discover the extraordinary smoothness and boldness of Southern Comfort with every sip.

Name: Ezra Brooks Old Ezra
Description: Our Kentucky straight bourbon undergoes a meticulous aging process within new, charred white oak barrels, patiently resting for seven years. The culmination of this process results in a bourbon that's bottled at its purest, untamed strength. Seven is now the luckiest number in your bourbon journey.

Name: Rich & Rare Reserve
Description: Rich & Rare Reserve stands as an impeccable blended whisky, meticulously crafted by the renowned Master Blender, Drew Mayville of the esteemed Sazerac Company. This exceptional blend showcases a unique union of smooth and spicy flavors, rendering it the perfect choice whether sipped on ice or employed in crafty mixed drinks. This whisky embodies a harmonious fusion of smoothness and spice, suitable for elevating any occasion. Tasting Notes: - Nose: Peppery spice harmonizes with toffee and caramel, creating a delightful equilibrium of sweetness. - Palate: Notes of sugarcane and candied fruit intermingle with peppercorn, painting a vivid flavor canvas. - Finish: The journey culminates in a soft and lingering denouement, adorned with baking spices and a subtle wisp of smoke. Awards: - Silver Medal, L.A. International Wine & Spirits Competition - Bronze Medal, San Francisco World Spirits Competition - Very Good, 89 points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge

Name: Yamazaki 12 Year Old Whisky
Description: The Yamazaki 12 Year is a distinguished Japanese single malt whisky renowned for its 'noble' aroma. Hailing from Kyoto, the ancient capital of Japan, it embodies an elevated level of nobility. Celebrated as the nation's premier single malt whisky, it enjoys global acclaim among whisky enthusiasts. Since 1984, The Yamazaki Distillery has meticulously crafted its Single Malt 12 Year. With a mash bill composed entirely of malted barley, this whisky undergoes a twelve-year maturation period within the confines of The Yamazaki Distillery before gracing your doorstep in its bottled form. But how does it taste, you may wonder? This golden elixir offers a tapestry of complexity and an unrivaled drinking experience. The nose entices with nuanced fruity notes, including hints of peach, grapefruit, pineapple, and candied orange, complemented by the warmth of spices like clove and orange zest. Rich coconut and tangy cranberry notes further enhance the flavor profile, while the enduring finish unfolds with the captivating embrace of spicy ginger and cinnamon. This is a whisky meant for savoring. Whether you prefer it neat in a tulip glass or over ice with the inclusion of a whisky stone, The Yamazaki 12 Year promises an exquisite experience. For a sparkling twist, consider mixing it with club soda to introduce a touch of brightness to its mellow character and accentuate its oak-infused essence. Alternatively, blend it in a one-part whisky to two-parts water ratio for a chilled and contemplative conclusion to your day.

Name: Templeton Rye Whiskey The Good Stuff 4 Year
Description: Templeton Rye 4 Year serves as an ideal introduction to the Templeton lineup. This medium-bodied rye whiskey presents an enticing bouquet of dried grass and rye spice on the nose. As you savor it, you'll encounter a harmonious fusion of flavors, including the richness of caramel and the indulgence of butterscotch candy intertwined with subtle rye spice and a whisper of vanilla. The result is an exceptionally smooth rye whiskey that seamlessly enhances any whiskey-based cocktail. Discover the perfect complement to your mixology endeavors with Templeton Rye 4 Year.
ImageLink: images/products/Templeton Rye Whiskey The Good Stuff 4 Year.webp

Name: Angel's Envy Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Angel's Envy stands as an extraordinary Kentucky straight bourbon, distinguished by its unique finishing process in port wine barrels.
