Recognized with the Highest Recommendation accolade from Spirit Journal, praised by esteemed publications like Whisky Advocate and The Bourbon Review, and honored with Wine Enthusiast's top bourbon rating, Angel's Envy promises a whiskey experience that defies convention and surpasses all expectations. Prepare to savor a whiskey unlike any other you've encountered before.
ImageLink: images/products/Angel's Envy Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Angel's Envy Rum Cask Rye
Description: Angel's Envy Rye Finished in Plantation XO Rum Casks, a limited release available only twice a year during the autumn and spring seasons, is an exceptional whiskey. These rum casks, having previously cradled French cognac, introduce an extra dimension of complexity to the palate. Prepare for a captivating interplay of robust elements as the fiery, spiced rye intertwines with the velvety sweetness of the rum, resulting in a distinctively delightful spirit that's truly one-of-a-kind.

Name: Russell's Reserve 10 Year Old Bourbon
Description: With a collective expertise of nearly a century, master distillers and esteemed whiskey artisans Jimmy and Eddie Russell meticulously create Russell's Reserve 10 Year Old Bourbon. Patiently selecting barrels aged for a minimum of 10 years, they craft a bourbon that harmoniously presents rich, spicy vanilla notes. Their seasoned craftsmanship ensures your extraordinary whiskey experience.

Name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel Bourbon
Description: Aged exclusively in meticulously chosen No. 4 'alligator' char American White Oak barrels, thoughtfully selected by our father and son Master Distillers, Jimmy and Eddie Russell. Every barrel possesses its distinct character while preserving our iconic rich, velvety toffee and vanilla essence. Bottled individually at 110 proof and without chill filtration to ensure the fullest flavor experience, this bourbon is designed for true connoisseurs to relish.

Name: BSB Brown Sugar Bourbon
Description: Never arrive at a gathering without a thoughtful contribution. Seize a bottle of BSB - Brown Sugar Bourbon to elevate the festivity. Transform enjoyable moments into extraordinary ones with the velvety, sugary allure of BSB. BSB is crafted for sharing. Notably, BSB has earned the esteemed title of 'World's Best Flavoured Whisky' for two consecutive years at Whisky Magazine's World Whiskies Awards in 2018 and 2019. Globally renowned, BSB is celebrated for its delightful, smooth conclusion enriched with comforting brown sugar and subtle notes of lively cinnamon.

Name: Dalwhinnie 15 Year
Description: Indulge in the timeless essence of Dalwhinnie 15 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky. The velvety notes of heather-infused honey, creamy vanilla, and zesty citrus fruits gracefully transition into a lingering and surprisingly robust finish. This 86 proof whisky achieved Gold Medal distinction at The San Francisco World Spirits Competition in 2017, and its complexity truly shines when enjoyed alongside crème brûlée or the comforting embrace of bread and butter pudding. The pristine and profound flavors of this matured whisky beckon for a straightforward serving, perhaps with a touch of chilled water. Handcrafted within the loftiest and chilliest working distillery in Scotland, utilizing water sourced from a loch nestled at 2,000 feet, Dalwhinnie whisky thrives amidst extreme conditions—yielding a libation as inviting and harmonious as its secluded highland birthplace. We kindly encourage responsible consumption.

Name: Seagram's 7 Crown Blended Whiskey
Description: Kick back, unwind, and allow the invigorating aroma of Seagram's 7 Crown American Blended Whiskey to envelop your senses. Our whiskey boasts a velvety, subtly sweet flavor profile that caresses your palate and concludes with a luscious, lingering note of vanilla. This American whiskey carries an 80-proof strength and undergoes meticulous blending and aging within oak barrels to accentuate its robust character. For an iconic 7 & 7 cocktail, simply combine Seagram's 7 Crown Blended American Whiskey with lemon-lime soda in a highball glass brimming with ice. Seagram's 7 Crown stands as an enduring emblem of American heritage, rooted in a storied legacy. We uphold our unwavering commitment to principles of integrity, artistry, and time-honored practices passed down by our brand's visionary founder. Our rich history of delivering premium quality and unrivaled smoothness sets Seagram's apart from the rest of the whiskey landscape. We humbly urge responsible consumption.

Name: Pendleton Canadian Whisky
Description: Every batch of Pendleton® undergoes a meticulous crafting process, meticulously blending ultra-premium whiskies derived from the finest northern grains. These exceptional whiskies are distilled to perfection and then allowed to rest within American oak barrels. To achieve the ideal proof, we employ the pristine, glacier-fed spring waters sourced from Oregon's loftiest summit, Mt. Hood. This age-old method ensures a consistently opulent flavor profile, characterized by an extraordinarily velvety finish. (40% ABV – 80 proof)

Name: Hibiki Japanese Harmony Whisky
Description: True to its name, Hibiki Japanese Harmony Whisky epitomizes the art of Japanese craftsmanship harmoniously blended into a single masterpiece. Renowned as the pinnacle of Japanese whisky, Hibiki is an exquisite fusion of multiple malt and grain whiskies, carefully orchestrated to create a symphony of captivating aromas and flavors. Hibiki represents the culmination of Japanese blending expertise and expert craftsmanship, infused with a generous dose of opulence. Introduced in 1989 as a tribute to Suntory's 90th anniversary, it has since become Japan's most decorated blended whisky, earning a place among the world's most prestigious spirits. Hibiki Japanese Harmony Whisky possesses both delicacy and brilliance, offering a captivating complexity. The amber elixir emanates an enchanting bouquet of rosemary, rose, lychee, and sandalwood, paving the way for a luscious sweetness complemented by nuances of white chocolate and candied orange peel. The finish is subtle, graced by hints of Japanese oak that linger on the palate. This exceptional whisky is best savored neat, over ice, or with a splash of water. Japanese whisky pairs exquisitely with Japanese cuisine, making it an excellent companion to dishes like sashimi, sushi, or boldly flavored fermented fish. It also lends itself beautifully to cocktails, such as the Sokaiya, where Hibiki combines harmoniously with bitter Sencha green tea and ginger liqueur.

Name: Kaiyo Mizunara Oak Cask Strength Japanese Whisky
Description: Kaiyō Whisky Cask Strength undergoes an exceptional maturation process exclusively within the finest Japanese Mizunara Oak barrels. Crafted from malted barley, our whiskies remain un-chillfiltered and undergo a distinctive three-month ocean aging, a crucial step that accentuates the exclusive Mizunara Oak flavors. TastingNotes: While Kaiyo Whisky 'The Signature' at 43% offers a more reserved experience, its bolder sibling bursts forth with intensified flavors. The nose is an explosion of vanilla, caramel, and exotic spices. On the palate, this whisky exhibits robust creaminess, accompanied by notes of exotic and candied fruits like melon, orange, and coconut. As the tasting journey unfolds, these fruity sensations segue into sweet oak, sandalwood, and a medley of baking spices, harmoniously balanced by a subtle hint of pepper.
ImageLink: images/products/Kaiyo Mizunara Oak Cask Strength Japanese Whisky.webp

Name: E.H. Taylor, Jr. Small Batch Bourbon
Description: Colonel Edmund Haynes Taylor, Jr., the visionary pioneer of the bourbon industry, bequeathed an enduring legacy. His relentless commitment to the craft of distillation commenced at the close of the Civil War when he acquired the O.F C. Distillery. It was here that he pioneered innovative techniques that persist to this day. Each Small Batch Bourbon Whiskey, meticulously handcrafted, undergoes maturation within the very centennial warehouses constructed by E.H. Taylor, Jr. The artistry lies in the evaluation and selection of barrels, an alchemical process that gives rise to a singular blend, distinguished by its character. This bourbon epitomizes the art of sipping, an homage to the unwavering legacy of E.H. Taylor, Jr. Key Features: - Small batch sourced from uniquely selected barrels - Bottled in Bond - 100 Proof - Aged in Warehouse C, erected in 1881 by E.H. Taylor TastingNotes: Immerse your senses in the sweet allure of caramel corn, intertwined with butterscotch and licorice. The culmination is a velvety mouth-feel that metamorphoses into subtle notes of pepper and tobacco.
ImageLink: images/products/E.H. Taylor, Jr. Small Batch Bourbon.webp

Name: Cutty Sark Blended Scotch Whisky
Description: Cutty Sark stands as an iconic whisky, its unmistakable yellow label adorning the finest bars and lounges across the globe for over nine decades. Pioneering the realm of light-colored blended Scotch whisky, Cutty Sark made its debut during the zenith of cocktail culture in the 1920s and remains the quintessential choice for effortless Scotch whisky indulgence. Experience Cutty Sark, a whisky that strikes a harmonious balance, brimming with the delectable essence of vanilla ice cream and caramel.

Name: Stranahan's Colorado Whiskey
Description: Stranahan's® Original is a whiskey crafted from 100% barley, meticulously double-distilled, and expertly refined with the pristine waters of the Rocky Mountains. It undergoes a two-year maturation process in virgin-charred American white oak barrels, imparting it with a distinctive and aromatic character. This exceptional spirit unfolds with an initial burst of caramel and vanilla, followed by notes of cola accompanied by toasted marshmallow, and further enriched with hints of chocolate and cinnamon spice. The experience is rounded out by a full-bodied, velvety texture, leading to a finish that revisits the essence of oak, accentuated by subtle nuances of mint, cayenne, and the sophistication of aged leather. Stranahan's® Original is best savored in its purest form, whether enjoyed neat, with a gentle splash of water, or as an essential ingredient in a variety of cocktails. (47% ABV – 94 proof)

Name: TX Blended Whiskey
Description: Firestone & Robertson embarked on a journey to elevate American blended whiskeys, believing that many of them lacked the depth and character found in revered Scottish, Irish, and Canadian whiskey blends. As dedicated craft distillers, they recognized a golden opportunity for innovation. Their mission was clear: craft an American blended whiskey that could stand shoulder to shoulder with the finest from Scotland, Ireland, and Canada. Over the course of more than two years, Firestone & Robertson meticulously sampled an extensive array of whiskeys. They identified the distinct qualities of their favorites and embarked on a journey of experimentation, seeking to create a blend with even greater richness and complexity. The result is TX Whiskey, a masterfully crafted elixir that offers a mesmerizing spectrum of aromas and flavors. Whether enjoyed on the rocks, in a cocktail, or neat, TX Whiskey shines with its exceptional depth and character. Nose: Inviting notes of vanilla bean, oak, and pear. Taste: Delightful layers of honey butter, banana, caramel, and coffee.

Name: Canadian Mist Canadian Whisky
Description: Canadian Mist® is an exquisite blended whisky, meticulously crafted using pristine water sourced from the Georgian Bay. Our whisky is lovingly aged in carefully selected white oak barrels, each charred to precise specifications. This meticulous process results in a whisky of unparalleled smoothness, boasting a timeless and classic flavor profile.

Name: Green Spot Irish Whiskey
Description: Greenspot Single Pot Still is a harmonious fusion of malted and unmalted barley, carefully aged for 7 to 12 years to achieve perfection. This remarkable whiskey exhibits a captivating character, occasionally unveiling a delightful sweetness akin to the renowned Perthshire malts of Scotland. Yet, the pot still nature proudly proclaims its Irish origin, showcasing a depth of maturity that surpasses the whiskey's age.

Name: Woodinville Whiskey Straight Bourbon
Description: This truly artisanal bourbon begins its journey with the finest corn, rye, and malted barley, grown exclusively for us on the Omlin Family farm in Quincy, Washington. These carefully cultivated grains undergo a meticulous process, from mashing to distillation, within the walls of our Woodinville distillery. Subsequently, they embark on a cross-mountain journey back to our secluded barrel houses in Central Washington, where they are exposed to the region's dramatic temperature fluctuations, coaxing out the oak's natural flavors. Before crafting the barrels, the wood undergoes an eighteen-month seasoning process in the elements – rain, wind, sun, and snow – which softens the wood's harsh tannins. The barrels are then gently toasted and deeply charred, enhancing the wood's rich, sought-after flavors.

Name: Heaven's Door Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Heaven's Door Straight Bourbon Whiskey, matured for a minimum of 6 years, stands out in every aspect. Its remarkable quality shines through, delivering a smooth and enduring experience, accompanied by delightful hints of baking spices and vanilla, gracefully resting atop a foundation of toasted oak.

Name: Yellowstone Bourbon Select 93
Description: The tasting experience begins with cherries and anise taking center stage on the palate. As the journey unfolds, delightful hints of brown sugar and vanilla emerge towards the end, culminating in a satisfyingly extended finish.

Name: Devils River Bourbon
TastingNotes: Caramel, Honey, Oak, Pepper, Smooth, Sweet
Description: Devils River Bourbon embodies the essence of the pristine waters it originates from. The initial sip boasts a robust character, paving the way for a harmonious blend of oak, honey, and caramel. This bourbon culminates with a velvety, sweet finish, serving as a gentle nudge that there's a touch of devilry within each of us.

Name: Aberfeldy 12 Year Scotch Whisky
Description: Aged gracefully for 12 years in meticulously crafted oak casks, this velvety, sweet elixir beckons connoisseurs to delve into its depths. Imbued with scents of incense, nutmeg, serene heather, and a fruit-laden symphony of cherry, pineapple, and raspberry marmalade. A subtle hint of smoke and sherry adds complexity. On the palate, it exhibits a medium body, gracefully rounded and somewhat viscous. The taste is a melange of fruitiness with tangerine, caramel, cocoa, and a delicate whisper of peat. The grand finale is opulent and smooth, marked by enduring notes of zesty, dry orange. This whisky transcends the ordinary, departing from mainstream offerings, making it a captivating alternative to the familiar classic malts.  Aberfeldy® whiskies stand apart with their extended fermentation, lasting up to 70 hours, delivering a lush, honeyed, and fruity flavor profile that has become a hallmark of the brand's distinctive style.

Name: Elijah Craig Small Batch Bourbon
TastingNotes: Mint, Nutmeg, Smoky, Sweet, Toasty, Vanilla, Woody
Description: Elijah Craig is celebrated as the pioneer who pioneered the art of aging whiskey in charred oak barrels, cementing his legacy as the 'Father of Bourbon.' This innovative use of charred barrels bestowed upon the formerly clear liquid a profound amber hue, infusing it with the distinctive wood-derived flavors that define Bourbon today. Elijah Craig Small Batch is meticulously crafted, with every step taking place in the heart of Kentucky. It begins with a traditional Bourbon mashbill comprising 78% Corn, 10% Rye, and 12% Malted Barley. The spirit is then aged gracefully for a period ranging from 8 to 12 years in new American oak barrels, charred to perfection. The culmination of this meticulous process is a Small Batch of Bourbon renowned for its hallmark warm spice and nuanced smokiness. This exceptional Bourbon has been bestowed with prestigious accolades, including the titles of 'Best Small Batch Bourbon' and 'Double Gold Medal' at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Furthermore, it has received a remarkable 93-Point rating, signifying an 'Excellent, Highly Recommended' status at the Ultimate Spirits Competition.

Name: Elijah Craig Barrel Proof Bourbon
TastingNotes: Apple, Bold, Caramel, Cinnamon, Oak, Pepper, Vanilla
Description: Indulge in the Bourbon that earned the coveted top spot in Whisky Advocate's international blind taste test of hundreds of whiskies from around the globe in 2017. Savoring our Barrel Proof Bourbon is akin to immersing yourself in the purest essence of Bourbon—unadulterated, directly from the barrel, and absent of any chill filtering. Each bottle bears a hand-applied label specifying its unique proof and batch number, yet every whiff, sip, and finish embodies the unadulterated essence of Elijah Craig. With Barrel Proof, you can relish Elijah Craig in the same manner as our Master Distillers do when they sample directly from the barrels within our Kentucky rickhouses. Elijah Craig Barrel Proof stands as the proud recipient of numerous prestigious awards from renowned spirits competitions. These accolades include the title of Whisky Advocate's Whisky of the Year, ranking as the #2 Whiskey by Wine Enthusiast, Double Gold recognition from the San Francisco World Spirits Competition, Double Gold honors at the Ultimate Spirits Challenge, and Double Gold accolades at the International World Spirits Competition, among numerous other distinctions. Prepare for an olfactory journey featuring the inviting scents of caramel and toasted oak, complemented by fruit undertones of apple and orange. Upon your palate, you'll encounter the opulent flavors of rich vanilla, caramel, and butterscotch, intertwined with subtle spices like black pepper and cinnamon that emerge toward the back. The finish is a masterful layering of all these flavors, with a gradual, cooling linger that unfolds at its own pace. ABV may vary according to the specific batch release and the inventory of the retailer.

Name: Blanton's Single Barrel Bourbon
Description: In the winter of 1881, Albert Bacon Blanton was born into a distinguished bourbon legacy, becoming a pivotal figure in the world of bourbon. He commenced his journey at the Distillery as an office boy at the tender age of sixteen and swiftly evolved into a trailblazer in bourbon's development. From 1921, when he assumed the role of company president, until his retirement in 1952, Colonel Blanton oversaw the remarkable expansion of the Distillery from 44 to 144 buildings, solidifying its status as the largest Distillery of its era. During this period, Colonel Blanton meticulously curated his exclusive and limited reserve of bourbon, personally selecting and storing it in what is now revered as Warehouse H. Although Colonel Blanton passed away in the spring of 1959, his legacy endures. In 1984, Blanton's namesake bourbon made its debut as the world's first commercially available Single Barrel Bourbon. Blanton's Original Single Barrel Bourbon remains a testament to its unparalleled uniqueness, marked by global critical acclaim. It has earned prestigious international gold medals, grand gold medals, and the acclaim of esteemed spirits connoisseurs, including Paul Pacult. The selection of individual barrels for Blanton's Single Barrel Bourbon is a meticulous process led by one of the most respected Master Distillers in the bourbon industry. Elmer T. Lee, an inductee into the Master Distillers' Hall of Fame, ventured into the hallowed corners of Warehouse H to personally identify barrels destined for greatness. Unlike other brands confined by age restrictions, Blanton's seeks to maintain a distinctive flavor profile across various years. While the typical bourbon used is around eight years old, it's not uncommon for the age to extend to ten or twelve years. From its world-class bourbon to its exceptional packaging, every aspect of Blanton's exudes quality, sophistication, and excellence. REVIEWS 'Liquid gold.' – Jim Murray's Whisky Bible TastingNotes: A profound and gratifying bouquet with hints of nutmeg and spices. Robust dry vanilla notes harmonize with traces of honey, complemented by prominent caramel and corn undertones. The medium finish encompasses a resurgence of corn and nutmeg flavors.

Name: Eagle Rare 10yr Bourbon
Description: Eagle Rare 10 Year is no ordinary bourbon, having earned numerous accolades at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Since 1975, it has been meticulously crafted in Frankfort, Kentucky, solidifying its status as a cherished gem in the American bourbon landscape. With an ABV of 45 percent, it offers a remarkable level of smoothness. Crafted with precision and aged in oak barrels for a minimum of a decade, Eagle Rare presents a complex tapestry of flavors, promising a unique tasting adventure. Upon pouring, the senses are greeted by an enticing bouquet featuring notes of toffee, honey, leather, oak, herbs, and orange peel. Upon sipping, the palate is treated to the rich oakiness complemented by hints of cocoa and almonds. It may sound reminiscent of a delectable breakfast cereal, but it's best savored in the company of friends after a long day. Eagle Rare 10 Year, like any exceptional bourbon, requires no embellishments to be enjoyed. A classic rocks glass is all you need. Fill it with one or two fingers of this bourbon or add a couple of ice cubes to fully appreciate its diverse flavor spectrum. For those seeking to unlock the full aromatic potential, a splash of water can be added, enhancing the overall experience without compromising its integrity. For cocktail enthusiasts, Eagle Rare is a delightful addition to classics like the Old Fashioned or Manhattan. In keeping with its Kentucky heritage, consider indulging in a mint julep. After your first sip, you might find yourself exclaiming, 'Giddyup!' To savor a glass of this exquisite bourbon, purchase Eagle Rare 10 Year online at an excellent price through Drizly and elevate your bourbon experience.

Name: Old Grand Dad Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Old Grand-Dad pays homage to its esteemed lineage, tracing its origins back to the visionary distiller Basil Hayden. This bourbon whiskey carries forward his legacy of crafting a unique blend with a higher rye content. The art of distillation was not only handed down to his son but continued through the generations. Colonel R.B. Hayden, the third-generation distiller, sought to honor his grandfather's enduring legacy by bestowing upon his renowned whiskey the name 'Old Grand-Dad.'

Name: Old Grand Dad 114 Proof Bourbon Whiskey
Description: With a striking deep amber hue and a robust 57% abv, this bourbon offers a distinctive experience. Nose: This bourbon exudes an airy and effervescent character even at its full strength. You'll be greeted by the inviting aromas of orange rind, caramelized sugars, luscious honey, hints of southern spearmint, and subtle floral undertones, reminiscent of orange blossom and honeysuckle. The grain notes of corn and dry rye complete the aromatic symphony. Upon pouring, allow it to rest in the glass for 3-4 minutes, and you'll find that the initial alcohol intensity quickly mellows, revealing its true essence. Palate: A tantalizing journey unfolds on your palate, starting with fleeting notes of honey, a touch of bitter orange, rich caramel, and creamy vanilla. These flavors gracefully give way to a warming ensemble of spices, featuring cinnamon, mint, and a hint of white pepper. The barrel's influence imparts additional depth, and a subtle resiny character adds texture, leading to the lingering finish.
ImageLink: images/products/Old Grand Dad 114 Proof Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Old Camp Peach Pecan Whiskey
Description: Old Camp® made its debut alongside Brian Kelley & Tyler Hubbard of Florida Georgia Line. This unique creation is the very first and exclusive peach pecan whiskey, expertly crafted through the fusion of American whiskey and two years of aging in American White Oak barrels.  Aroma: Upon approach, it presents a captivating bouquet of fresh citrus, the alluring sweetness of Georgia peaches, and the comforting nuttiness of southern pecans. Flavor: As you savor it, you'll encounter a harmonious blend of nutty caramel that beautifully complements the whiskey's character, leading to a crisp and invigorating spiced peach finish. Get the party started right with Old Camp®. This exceptional whiskey is best enjoyed straight as a shot, over ice, or, for an extra twist, as a key ingredient in delightful concoctions like Old Camp® Iced Tea or Lemonade. At 35% ABV (70 proof), it's a versatile addition to your drink lineup.

Name: TINCUP American Whiskey
Description: TINCUP® American Whiskey is the artful fusion of two exceptional American whiskeys, each meticulously aged in charred oak barrels, designated #3.  This harmonious blend consists of 'high rye' bourbon, skillfully distilled and matured in the heart of Indiana, artfully combined with a touch of Colorado's very own single malt whiskey. The result? TINCUP® American Whiskey—a captivating caramel-hued spirit. Aroma: As you approach this remarkable whiskey, your senses will be greeted by a symphony of citrus notes, an enticing hint of black pepper, and the comforting aroma of ginger snaps. Flavor: With each sip, you'll embark on a flavor journey marked by the distinct warmth of rye spice, a touch of cinnamon, and the rich embrace of caramel. This exquisite Mountain whiskey culminates in a clean, invigorating finish, heightened by the lingering presence of rye spice. To ensure its optimal character, TINCUP® American Whiskey is meticulously cut to proof, using nothing but the purest Rocky Mountain water. With a 42% ABV (84 proof), it offers a well-balanced and captivating whiskey experience that embodies the spirit of the Rockies.

Name: Black Velvet Canadian Whisky
Description: In 1951, the world was introduced to Black Velvet, a Canadian Whisky that would go on to claim the title of the second largest in its category globally. Originally known as 'Black Label,' its destiny took a twist when the inaugural batch was sampled by none other than Jack Napier, the visionary distiller behind it. Impressed by its unique velvety character and unparalleled smoothness, he bestowed upon it the name 'Black Velvet.' Crafted with meticulous care, Black Velvet starts with the purest Canadian water, combining it with the finest rye, grains, and corn. This blend undergoes an exacting distillation process and is uniquely 'Blended at Birth™,' before being thoughtfully placed into premium oak barrels for a gentle maturation period. The outcome is a whiskey brimming with unadulterated flavor and a steadfast reputation. With an aging process of three years, Black Velvet emerges as an extraordinarily smooth, medium-bodied whisky. Immerse your senses in its rich tapestry of flavors, where hints of caramel, vanilla, coconut, and rye harmonize to create an exquisite symphony of taste. Experience the unparalleled allure of Black Velvet, a testament to the artistry of Canadian whisky-making.

Name: Windsor Canadian Blended Whiskey
Description: Windsor Canadian is a whisky that embodies a gentle and nuanced flavor profile. Crafted from carefully selected cereal grains cultivated in the vicinity of Calgary, Alberta, it marries the pristine and crystal-clear waters of Western Canada's glacial streams. This harmonious blend is then entrusted to the serene and dry surroundings of the majestic Canadian Rocky Mountains for aging. The result is a light and delicately flavored whisky that encapsulates the essence of its natural origins. Each sip carries with it the spirit of the Canadian wilderness, a testament to the pure ingredients and meticulous craftsmanship that define Windsor Canadian.

Name: Paddy's Irish Whiskey
Description: Our Irish Whiskey has a heritage that stretches back to the year 1779. However, its true identity took shape much later, thanks to a charismatic salesman named Paddy Flaherty. Paddy traversed from pub to pub, not just peddling a smooth triple-distilled whiskey but also carrying with him an infectious sense of humor and celebration. Paddy was adored as much as the whiskey he offered, particularly for his generous tradition of providing rounds of drinks at every establishment he visited. It was only fitting that this exceptional whiskey would come to be known as Paddy's. Paddy's is a welcoming Irish whiskey, a blend of grain, malt, and pot-still spirits, all triple-distilled to perfection. It embodies a mild yet invigorating character, with subtle notes of honey that enhance its appeal. Paddy's is the ideal companion for convivial gatherings with friends, creating an atmosphere of warmth and camaraderie. Distilled meticulously from the finest barley and pure water sourced from the picturesque Irish countryside in County Cork, Paddy's undergoes a maturation process that spans years. It rests in three different types of oak casks, absorbing the essence of its surroundings and developing a uniquely rich and golden hue within the aromatic confines of dark warehouses. From there, it makes its journey directly from Ireland to your glass. Tasting Notes: Nose: Malty, fresh, and woody. Delicate hints of spice, honey, and vanilla. Taste: Light and crisp, with subtle notes of nuts, malt, and charred wood. Finish: A gentle, lingering sweetness followed by the mild, woody essence of malt.

Name: Sazerac Rye Whiskey
Description: Sazerac Rye Whiskey stands as the unparalleled embodiment of New Orleans' tradition and history. This rye whiskey carries a legacy dating back to the 1800s, a time when clandestine saloons, masquerading as Coffee Houses, began to grace the streets of this vibrant city. It was at the iconic Sazerac Coffee House on Royal Street where local patrons were treated to toddies crafted from Rye Whiskey and Peychaud's Bitters. This concoction soon became renowned as the 'Sazerac,' giving birth to America's very first branded cocktail. Sazerac Rye is the whiskey that ignited this spirited revolution and remains the most celebrated rye whiskey since 2005. The extraordinary balance of sweetness and spice found in Sazerac Rye is a testament to its unique recipe and the quality of rye employed, as well as the meticulous distillation process carried out at Buffalo Trace Distillery. Tasting Notes: Nose: A delightful bouquet of vanilla, clove, anise, and pepper. Taste: An indulgence in candied spices and citrus notes. Finish: A smooth, lingering essence of licorice and smoked pepper.

Name: Hochstadter's Slow & Low Rock and Rye
Description: Slow & Low represents a contemporary twist on the historic Rock & Rye tradition. Crafted from a blend of 84 proof Straight Rye Whiskey, a touch of rock candy, and a fusion of raw honey, navel oranges, and the essential Angostura bitters, Slow & Low emerges as the quintessential bottled old fashioned. This libation encapsulates the essence of rebellion and free-spiritedness, mirroring the lifestyles of punks, artists, craftsmen, and problem solvers. It seamlessly fits into a multitude of settings, from dimly lit dives to raucous mosh pits, tailgate parties to high-speed drag races, and from refined cocktail lounges to personal liquor cabinets. Slow & Low serves as a catalyst for shared stories by the fire and toasts among friends. While it welcomes everyone, its origins are deeply rooted in the narratives of those with diverse and colorful life experiences. It's a spirit that transcends boundaries and brings people together to savor life's moments.
ImageLink: images/products/Hochstadter's Slow & Low Rock and Rye.webp

Name: Larceny Small Batch
Description: Crafted with wheat instead of rye as the secondary grain, our distinctive Small Batch Wheated Bourbon offers an irresistibly smooth flavor that captivates the senses. It has earned accolades, including the prestigious Gold award at the 2020 San Francisco World Spirits Competition, the esteemed Double Gold recognition at the consumer-driven SIP Awards, and an impressive 91-point rating from the Ultimate Spirits Challenge.

Name: Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Whiskey
TastingNotes: Bold, Caramel, Dried Fruit, Spicy, Stone Fruit, Vanilla
Description: Uncle Nearest 1856 is a distinguished blend of 8 to 14-year-old barrels, thoughtfully bottled at a robust 100 proof. The remarkable smoothness of Uncle Nearest allows you to savor it neat, over ice, or as the cornerstone of your preferred whiskey or bourbon concoction. In 2017, Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Aged Whiskey made its debut in the United States, paying homage to the pioneering African American master distiller. This premium whiskey quickly expanded its presence across the nation and around the globe, now gracing shelves in 50 states, spanning 12 countries, and reaching enthusiasts in over 148 countries worldwide. Uncle Nearest proudly holds the title of the Fastest-Growing Independent American Whiskey Brand in U.S. History. Uncle Nearest Premium Whiskey has garnered a staggering collection of over 125 prestigious awards and accolades from across the globe. These include notable recognitions such as being named among the 'Top 5 Whiskies in the World' by Cigar & Spirits Magazine and earning the coveted title of 'World's Best' by Whisky Magazine. In 2019, Uncle Nearest stood tall as the most awarded premium American whiskey or bourbon.

Name: Uncle Nearest 1884 Small Batch Whiskey
Description: Each and every batch of Uncle Nearest 1884 Small Batch Whiskey undergoes a meticulous selection process, personally overseen by our founders and carefully curated by the fifth-generation Master Blender, Victoria Eady Butler. Her signature proudly graces the back of every bottle, representing a legacy of excellence. Aged for a minimum of 7 years and confidently bottled at 93-proof, this whiskey epitomizes the art of smooth sipping. In 2019, Uncle Nearest 1884 was introduced to the esteemed Uncle Nearest Premium Whiskey lineup, joining the ranks of Uncle Nearest 1820 and Uncle Nearest 1856. These three ultra-premium whiskies have collectively amassed an impressive collection of over 125 awards since their debut in July 2017. Among their accolades are two prestigious 'World's Best' titles from the World Whiskies Awards, recognition as 'Top 5 Whiskies in the World' by Cigar & Spirits Magazine, and distinguished honors including 'Chairman's Trophy,' 'Platinum,' and 'Double Gold' at the SIP Awards, along with the esteemed title of 'Best American Whiskey.'

Name: Seagram's VO Canadian Whisky
Description: The enigmatic tale behind Seagram's V.O., a renowned whisky crafted at the former Waterloo Distillery of Joseph E. Seagram, has left us with a captivating mystery. According to family lore, 'V.O.' is believed to signify 'Very Own,' indicating that this whisky blend was originally conceived for Joseph E. Seagram's personal enjoyment. Alternatively, some suggest that the initials represent 'Very Old,' aligning with the distiller's claim that it comprises a blend of exceptionally aged Canadian whiskies. Legend has it that Joseph's son, Thomas, enlisted the expertise of the distillery's blender, William Hortop, to create a special whisky blend in honor of his impending marriage to Dorothy Pearson in 1913. Upon sampling this distinctive concoction, Joseph was so impressed that he insisted the family blend be made available to the public. It quickly soared to become one of Seagram's most beloved offerings. Unravel the mystique of Seagram's V.O. and savor a piece of whisky history.

Name: Old Overholt Rye Whiskey
Description: Old Overholt stands as the eldest among The Olds, a living relic of times past that you can savor with every sip. This renowned Straight Rye Whiskey possesses a unique flavor profile and an enduring charm that, following the era of Prohibition, propelled it to the pinnacle of popularity, making it the nation's most beloved spirit. 'Agreeable' signifies the ability to harmonize seamlessly, and Old Overholt embodies this quality to perfection. It has earned its reputation for exceptional versatility, particularly in crafting timeless cocktails like the revered Old Style Manhattan (you can explore the recipe for yourself). The singular and incomparable Old Overholt Rye Whiskey boasts a robust 80 Proof and has been artfully aged for a period of 3 years, resulting in a whisky that transcends time and tradition.

Name: Noble Oak Double Oak Bourbon
Description: Noble Oak Bourbon is a recipient of prestigious awards, celebrated for its exceptional double oak maturation process, and driven by a noble purpose. Following its initial aging in freshly charred American oak barrels, this bourbon embarks on a transformative journey, culminating in the infusion of carefully chosen sherry-seasoned European oak staves. The result is a whiskey that exhibits a distinctive, multifaceted flavor profile. Enticing fragrances of honey-kissed cornbread and sun-dried fruits harmoniously intertwine with the sumptuous tastes of oven-fresh pie, warm cinnamon, and comforting nutmeg. The experience culminates in a gentle, comforting finish that lingers like a fond memory. Noble Oak serves as a tribute to the majestic American and European oak trees that bestow upon it a warm and inviting character. In a steadfast commitment to the environment, each bottle contributes to the noble cause of reforestation. Through our partnership with One Tree Planted, a tree is planted for every bottle sold, making Noble Oak not just a bourbon of exceptional quality but also a force for good in preserving and restoring our precious natural green spaces.

Name: Benchmark Old No. 8 Bourbon
TastingNotes: Caramel, Cherry, Leather, Oak, Stone Fruit, Tobacco
Description: In homage to the McAfee brothers, renowned for their land surveying endeavors near Frankfort in the late 1700s, we proudly present this bourbon crafted from a cherished rye recipe. It's a testament to both the rich heritage of our Distillery and the hallowed grounds it occupies. Delve into the tasting experience: The aroma beckons with the sweet embrace of caramel, complemented by subtle undertones of stone fruits. As you savor each sip, a robust and resolute palate unfolds, offering intricate notes of fine leather intertwined with the essence of dry tobacco. A gentle whisper of oak and the faintest hint of dried cherries add to the tapestry of flavors. The journey culminates in a serene and soothing finish, leaving you with a sense of tranquility. This bourbon is a tribute to history, a nod to the McAfee brothers, and a celebration of the land's enduring legacy.

Name: Henry McKenna Single Barrel Bourbon, 10 Year, Bottled-in-Bond
TastingNotes: Caramel, Herbal, Honey, Oak, Spicy, Vanilla
Description: In the year 1837, a young and talented Irish craftsman, renowned for his whiskey-making prowess, embarked on a journey to America, bearing a cherished family whiskey recipe that had traversed generations. Settling in the heart of Kentucky, this enterprising gentleman encountered the uniquely American libation known as Bourbon. Captivated by its essence, Mr. McKenna, brimming with determination, embarked on a mission to refine Bourbon craftsmanship, guided by his ancestral recipe. To safeguard the pinnacle of quality, he insisted upon the patient maturation of his Bourbon within oak barrels before its noble bottling. This method, atypical for its time, yielded an exquisitely smooth Bourbon, distinguished by its character and allure. As one of the exclusive extra-aged Bottled-in-Bond Single Barrel Bourbons, Henry McKenna Single Barrel stands as a testament to those seeking an authentic whiskey steeped in rich history. Its super-premium essence is now elegantly encapsulated in new packaging. The front label proudly displays handcrafted validation of the barrel number and the date of its journey into the barrel. It underscores the esteemed Bottled-In-Bond distinction and proudly proclaims its 10-year age statement, a hallmark of its exceptional quality and heritage.
ImageLink: images/products/Henry McKenna Single Barrel Bourbon, 10 Year, Bottled-in-Bond.webp

Name: Baker's Single Barrel 7 Year Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Derived from the rich lineage of bourbon craftsmanship and bearing the name of Baker Beam, grandnephew of the illustrious Jim Beam, Baker's Bourbon represents a seven-year journey culminating in a hand-bottled spirit boasting a formidable 107 proof. With a legacy spanning over six generations of distilling mastery, Baker's Bourbon distinguishes itself by harnessing the potency of a unique jug yeast strain that has remained an integral part of his family's heritage for more than six decades. This venerable yeast strain, tried and tested by time, imparts to Baker's Bourbon a luxuriously smooth consistency and a steadfast flavor profile that remains unwavering from one meticulously crafted batch to the next.
ImageLink: images/products/Baker's Single Barrel 7 Year Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey.webp

Name: Old Crow Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Old Crow Bourbon Whiskey is a delightful libation that exudes sweetness and lightness. Infused with captivating hints of vanilla and caramel, each sip offers a refreshing and crisp experience, culminating in a light yet satisfying finish.

Name: BLACKENED™ American Whiskey
TastingNotes: Balanced, Caramel, Cinnamon, Dark Fruit, Honey, Smooth, Spicy, Vanilla
Description: Experience the Revolution in American Whiskey - BLACKENED is the groundbreaking super-premium whiskey born from the genius collaboration of Master Distiller Dave Pickerell and the legendary Metallica. Crafted by blending meticulously selected, matured bourbons and ryes, this exceptional whiskey undergoes a unique finishing process in black brandy casks, all while being infused with the thunderous music of Metallica. Our proprietary BlackNoise™ finishing technique sets BLACKENED™ apart. Each whiskey batch is immersed in its custom Metallica playlist, meticulously curated by the band themselves. The low-frequency sound waves compel the whiskey to delve deeper into the barrel, extracting an abundance of caramel, honey, and vanilla notes from the oak. The result? A harmoniously balanced whiskey, brimming with flavor, perfect for savoring straight, on the rocks, or in your favorite classic cocktail.

Name: Canadian LTD Canadian Whisky
Description: Canadian LTD is meticulously crafted under the expert guidance of Drew Mayville, the esteemed Master Blender at Sazerac. With over four decades of experience in Canadian Whisky making, including an impressive 23-year tenure at Seagram's, where he held the prestigious title of the fourth and final master blender in the Seagram lineage. Canadian LTD, an 80-proof Canadian whisky, has been artfully aged for a duration of three years. Its captivating profile boasts enticing aromas and flavors of pure maple sugar, creamy vanilla, and a delightful hint of spice. This is harmoniously balanced with a dry yet fruity medium body, culminating in a warm, invigorating, peppery finish. Our whisky is not only a testament to craftsmanship but also the ideal choice for elevating your cocktail creations.

Name: Skrewball Peanut Butter Whiskey
TastingNotes: Caramel, Honey, Roasted, Toasty, Vanilla, Velvety
Description: In one corner, we have the classic whiskey - bold, unapologetic, and radiating confidence. In the other corner, we introduce you to peanut butter - the epitome of smooth, indulgent, and utterly irresistible. It's the faithful companion you can always count on to satisfy those late-night cravings. But here's the kicker: these two seemingly different worlds collide in an extraordinary way. They complement each other so flawlessly that even the iconic PB&J duo might feel a pang of jealousy. It's a taste sensation that's impossible to resist. However, we must give you fair warning - a rendezvous with Skrewball is a journey into the wonderfully nutty side of life.

Name: Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whiskey
Description: Sure, it might sound a bit unconventional - the union of peanut butter and whiskey. At first, even we thought it was a bit nutty. But then, inspiration struck. It was time for a whiskey that could elevate any gathering to a whole new level of excitement. So, reach for a bottle of Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whiskey, step out from the crowd, and let the good times roll with a howl-worthy twist.

Name: Slane Irish Whiskey
Description: In the heart of Slane, Ireland, we bring you Slane Irish Whiskey, a testament to the essence of our town and the legacy we hold dear. Crafted through our unique 'Triple Casked' method, we age our Grain and Malt whiskies with care, allowing them to rest within three distinct cask types - Virgin Oak, Seasoned Oak, and Oloroso Sherry. These carefully curated casks come together to create an Irish whiskey that is exceptionally rich and smooth, embodying the spirit and character of the people of Slane, as well as those who take pride in forging their own legacy. Experience the distinctive taste of Slane Irish Whiskey today.

Name: Yellow Spot Irish Whiskey
Description: Experience a symphony of scents that will transport you to a world of sensory bliss. Our whiskey unveils a captivating bouquet, with notes of freshly mown hay, the gentle warmth of cracked black pepper, the enticing embrace of nutmeg, the soothing essence of clove oil, and the subtle allure of green tea. As you savor this remarkable whiskey, you'll also discover the delightful infusion of sweet honey and the succulent essence of peaches, which are gracefully imparted by the Malaga casks. Elevate your tasting experience with the exquisite aromas of our whiskey.

Name: Proper No. Twelve Irish Whiskey
Description: Indulge in the unmatched quality of Proper No. Twelve™ Irish Whiskey, a meticulously crafted blend of fine grain and single malt. Triple-distilled for perfection and lovingly aged in bourbon barrels for four years, this spirit is the epitome of smoothness, revealing enchanting notes of creamy vanilla, luscious honey, and the warmth of toasted wood. Proper No. Twelve™ is not just a whiskey; it's an experience. Approachable and honest, this whiskey welcomes you to savor it over ice, allowing its rich flavors to shine. Alternatively, explore its versatility in cocktails like the Proper Mule, where it adds a unique twist to classic libations. This exceptional whiskey is a heartfelt tribute to its founder, Conor McGregor, and the vibrant neighborhood of Crumlin, Dublin 12. Rooted in the values of brotherhood, loyalty, and unwavering dedication, Proper No. Twelve™ embodies the spirit of its origin, inviting you to partake in a legacy of exceptional taste and camaraderie.

Name: Suntory Toki Japanese Whisky
Description: In Japanese, 'Toki' translates to 'time,' a concept that resonates deeply across the globe. However, it holds a profound significance in Japan, where a profound respect for tradition harmonizes seamlessly with a spirit of innovation, giving birth to boundless creative energy. Suntory Whisky Toki™ masterfully embodies this delicate balance, uniting the time-honored legacy of the House of Suntory with its relentless spirit of innovation. The result is a harmonious blend of Japanese whisky that transcends convention, simultaneously redefining the future while paying homage to the past. Discover the pinnacle of Japanese whisky craftsmanship with Suntory Whisky, a brand distinguished by its commitment to excellence. Awarded the prestigious Gold Medal at the 2017 Denver International Spirits Competition, Suntory Whisky Toki™ invites you to savor the essence of time in every sip, a testament to the enduring quality of this exceptional blend.

Name: Rittenhouse Rye
Description: Step into the rich history of Philadelphia's iconic Rittenhouse Square with Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey. This time-honored spirit pays homage to the storied past of the city and its enduring legacy. As a 'Bottled-in-Bond' whiskey, today's Rittenhouse remains faithful to the heritage that has made it a revered name among whiskey enthusiasts. Its distinctive, spicy flavor profile stands as a testament to the brand's enduring commitment to quality and craftsmanship. Renowned for its exceptional quality and versatility, Rittenhouse has earned its place as the preferred Rye whiskey for both skilled mixologists and passionate whiskey connoisseurs. Discover the distinctive character and timeless appeal that make Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey an essential addition to any collection.

Name: Legent Bourbon Whiskey
Description: Legent Bourbon is not your average bourbon; it's a distinguished Gold Medal winner at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Breaking boundaries and redefining the art of bourbon-making, Legent stays true to its core principles while pushing the envelope. Legent is the brainchild of an extraordinary collaboration between two whiskey legends: Fred Noe, representing the founding family of bourbon and Jim Beam's seventh-generation Master Distiller, and Shinji Fukuyo, hailing from the venerable house of Japanese whisky as Suntory's fifth-ever Chief Blender. Together, they crafted a blend of several exceptional bourbons, some aged in newly charred white oak barrels, and others extra-aged in wine and sherry casks. The result is a bourbon that strikes a harmonious balance, boasting layers of complexity and a unique character that sets it apart from anything you've experienced before. Explore the art of bourbon with Legent.

Name: Noah's Mill Bourbon
Description: Imagine Noah, tasked with selecting only two bourbons for his ark. It's a safe bet that Noah's Mill Bourbon would secure its place. This bourbon is the epitome of opulence and authenticity, a spirit that stands alone in its class. As a proud member of the esteemed Willett Family of Bourbons, Noah's Mill is distilled in the heart of Bardstown, Kentucky, a locale renowned as the 'Bourbon Capital of the World.' It comes as no surprise that Noah's Mill Bourbon proudly ranks among the elite craft bourbons available today. Aging gracefully for a minimum of 4 years and often up to two decades, Noah's Mill Bourbon is a testament to the art of small-batch bourbon production. Every bottle is a labor of love, meticulously crafted with the utmost care and precision, a hallmark of authentic craft bourbon. As you uncork this exceptional spirit, prepare to be enveloped by an enchanting medley of floral, prune, and walnut aromas. Each sip is a journey through a lush landscape of spice, lavender, and caramel notes, a unique blend that only Noah's Mill Bourbon can deliver. For purists who seek unadulterated bourbon bliss, sipping Noah's Mill Bourbon neat or over ice in a low-ball glass is the ultimate experience. For those who dare to be different, a splash of water or an ice cube can introduce a refreshing twist, perfect for outdoor enjoyment. Cocktail aficionados, rejoice! Noah's Mill Bourbon is your ticket to elevating your libations to new heights. Whether you're crafting a classic Old Fashioned or indulging in a mint julep, the transformative power of Noah's Mill enhances every cocktail, making it the best you've ever tasted. Embark on a journey of excellence with Noah's Mill Bourbon. Order online through Drizly at a fantastic price and savor the extraordinary flavors of this remarkable bourbon. Elevate your bourbon experience with Noah's Mill.

Name: Kentucky Gentleman Bourbon
TastingNotes: Spicy, Caramel, Apples, Pepper, Dried fruits, Raisins, Tart, Harmonious
Description: Crafted in the heart of the Bourbon Capital of the World since 1879, Kentucky Gentleman Bourbon stands as a timeless and velvety bourbon whiskey. It embodies the essence of Southern hospitality, inviting you to savor Kentucky's finest moments, whether on a tranquil front porch as the sun gracefully sets or amid the gentle whispers of the wind through the trees. This bourbon is your companion for those cherished moments of relaxation.

Name: Fistful Of Bourbon
Description: Fistful of Bourbon is more than just whiskey; it's a harmonious blend of five distinct American bourbons – an actual handful of quality. Crafted by the skilled hands of William Grant & Son's Master Blender, Brian Kinsman, recipient of the 2017 ISC Master Distiller of the Year, and Kelsey McKechnie, the world's youngest female Apprentice Malt Master and Whisk(e)y Blender at William Grant & Son. Their quest led them through a meticulous tasting journey, handpicking five straight bourbons that contribute to the creation of a complex and impeccably smooth flavor profile. You'll find a touch of sweetness, green, leafy, and floral notes, warm spice with hints of nutmeg, rich buttery toffee, and subtle tones of cinnamon and licorice. This results in a bourbon that's not just big and bold but sets itself apart from the rest. Fistful of Bourbon's exceptional quality is underlined by its accolades, including a prestigious Double Gold medal at the 2019 International Spirits Challenge (ISC) and a Gold medal at the 2020 San Francisco Spirits Awards. Don't miss your chance to savor this remarkable bourbon; it's not just bourbon – it's a mighty Fistful.

Name: Clan Macgregor Scotch
TastingNotes: Rich, grainy sweetness, hints of dry smoke, baked apple, biscuity, smooth, malty, lingering
Description: Indulge in the rich heritage of Clan Macgregor Scotch whisky, a masterpiece crafted from fifteen of the most exceptional malt and grain whiskies at the heart of Scotland. The artistry behind this blend shines through in every sip. Delicate and inviting, Clan Macgregor boasts a sweet aroma that captivates the senses. As you savor each drop, you'll experience a remarkably smooth and mellow taste that has earned this whisky numerous accolades and awards over the years. Elevate your whisky experience with Clan Macgregor – a testament to the time-honored traditions of Scotch whisky craftsmanship.

Name: Monkey Shoulder Blended Scotch
Description: Monkey Shoulder is a carefully crafted blend of Speyside single malt Scotch whiskies, masterfully married together to create a symphony of flavor and unwavering consistency. It's a celebration of richness and vibrancy, marked by fruity aromas and a subtle embrace of mellow vanilla, making it the ideal choice for elevating your mixed drinks and cocktails. The essence of Monkey Shoulder lies in the transformation that takes place within former bourbon casks, infusing the whisky with the smooth, alluring notes of vanilla. Notably, this Scotch whisky contains no grain whisky whatsoever, ensuring that it remains a true barley aficionado's delight from start to finish. The name 'Monkey Shoulder' may raise an eyebrow or two, but it's steeped in whisky-making lore. In days gone by, maltmen tirelessly turned barley by hand, often over long shifts that favored one arm. This physical strain resulted in a unique ailment, causing their shoulders to droop on one side—a condition affectionately dubbed 'Monkey Shoulder.' Rest assured, the modern-day artisans behind Monkey Shoulder whisky no longer suffer from this ailment. However, they continue to turn the barley by hand, honoring the tradition while enjoying improved working conditions. Monkey Shoulder is a versatile spirit, captivating the palate whether enjoyed neat, with a splash of water, or over ice. It also shines in mixed drinks, lending its distinct orange and vanilla flavors, accented by a touch of spice. Delight your senses and impress your friends by including Monkey Shoulder in classic cocktails like the Rob Roy or the Blood and Sand. Elevate your whisky experience by ordering Monkey Shoulder Blended Scotch online through Drizly. You can have it conveniently delivered to your doorstep or pick it up in-store at a great price.

Name: J&B Rare Blended Scotch
Description: Experience the exceptional taste of J&B Rare Blended Scotch Whisky, a blend that encapsulates the essence of smoothness and complexity. At its core, J&B Rare incorporates the finest malt whiskies hailing from Speyside, a region renowned as the pinnacle of single malt whisky production in Scotland. These malt whiskies lend J&B Rare its light color and infuse it with a delightful, fruity freshness that sets it apart. To craft this distinguished blend, J&B Rare also calls upon the expertise of Scotland's most exceptional grain whiskies. These grains play a crucial role in unveiling the individual characteristics of the various malts while maintaining the whisky's signature smoothness. Whether savored on its own or incorporated into your favorite cocktail, J&B Rare is a versatile spirit that shines in any setting. For a classic drink, pair it with cola and pour it over ice, allowing the flavors to meld harmoniously. J&B Rare is the result of a meticulous process that brings together 42 single malt and grain whiskies, skillfully harmonized to create a subtly intricate and smooth flavor profile. It's this delicate equilibrium that defines the distinctive character of J&B Rare. As you enjoy J&B Rare Blended Scotch Whisky, we encourage you to do so responsibly.
